Sus utensilios y materiales que necesita los compra en la ciudad de Santiago, en el comercio para profesionales, donde los precios sean más convenientes económicamente.
Con el crédito comprará una plancha para cabello, máquina de depilación, un secador de pelo, materiales de construcción para mejorar la infraestructura del local y costear los servicios de gasfitería, para realizar la mantención de su calefont. 
Una de sus metas es instalarse con una escuela de estilistas, para que estudiantes de estética se puedan perfeccionar en distintas áreas. De esta manera enseñar y titular buenos profesionales.
Elizabeth vive junto a sus tres hijos de 19, 13 y 10 años de edad. Su hijo mayor estudia en la Universidad la carrera de Ingeniería Civil Industrial. Sus sueños son realizarse profesionalmente.
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad brindada por Fondo esperanza, ya que el préstamo le permitirá invertir en su negocio.
Por su parte, con las capacitaciones ha aprendido a organizar de mejor manera la contabilidad de su negocio, ya que ahora registra sus ingresos y gastos.
Respecto al grupo del Banco comunal del cual forma parte, éste es muy responsable y comprometido, por lo que Elizabeth se siente muy cómoda.
Curicó se ubica en la región del Maule, zona centro del país. El clima de Curicó es de tipo mediterráneo y es considerado como uno de los más agradables del país. Se caracteriza además por su cultura en torno al vino y sus alrededores de belleza natural.  A pesar de que la fuerza de trabajo se ha  incrementado, esta zona sigue siendo, según el último censo, una de las más pobres del país.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is part of the “Unidos Empredemos con Esperanza” (Together We Enterprise with Hope) communal bank belonging to the city of Curicó.  She is a stylist so provides beauty services.  She comments that she equipped her own beauty salon in her house.  She’s been in this line of work for 24 years.

She works Monday through Saturday with a flexible schedule but on days of high demand she works a continuous schedule.  She comments that she has quite a few regular customers.

The work tools she needs she buys in the city of Santiago at a supply shop for professionals where prices are more affordable.  She will use the loan to buy a hair straightening iron, a hair removal machine, a hair dryer, building materials and supplies to improve the infrastructure of her locale and to pay plumbing costs to service her water heater.

One of her goals is to set up a school for stylists so that students can specialize in various areas; this way she can teach and graduate good professionals.

Elizabeth lives with her three children who are 19, 13 and 10 years old.  Her oldest son attends the university studying Civil Industrial Engineering.  His dream is to become a professional.

She is very happy and grateful for the opportunity provided by Fondo Esperanza because the loan will allow her to invest in her business.

The training she’s received has taught her to organize her business’ bookkeeping better and she now keeps track of her earnings and expenditures.  With respect to the communal bank group she belongs to, it is very responsible and committed so Elizabeth feels very comfortable.

Curicó is located in the Maule Region in the center of the country.  Curicó’s climate is Mediterranean and considered one of the country’s most pleasant.  It’s also noted for its culture associated with wine making and for the natural beauty of its surroundings.  Despite rising employment this zone continues to be, according to the latest census, one of the country’s poorest.

loans.use: To buy a hair straightening iron, a hair removal machine, a hair dryer, building materials and supplies to improve the infrastructure of her locale and to pay plumbing costs to service her water heater.

loans.name: Nemat

texts.ru: Неъмат добрый, трудолюбивый и честный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Неъмат с детства увлекался работать в поле, помогал отцу по выращивание картофеля, пшеницы и скота. В настоящее время он самостоятельно занимается этим бизнесом. Более 18 лет он в этой сфере бизнеса. В бизнесе помогают жена и дети. Неъмат запрашивает займ для покупки семян, минеральных удобрений и комбикорм для скота. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Nemat is a kind, hard-working, and honest man. He is married and is raising two children. His wife looks after the household. Nemat has been interested in farming since he was a child, helping his father cultivate potatoes and wheat, and raise livestock. Currently, he is engaged in this business on his own, with help from his wife and children. He has been an entrepreneur for 18 years. Nemat is requesting this loan to purchase seeds, mineral fertilizer, and animal feed. He is hoping for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy seeds, mineral fertilizers, and animal feed

loans.name: Bakhtiniso

texts.ru: Бахтинисо трудолюбивая, добрая и честная женщина. Она замужем и любящая мать двоих детей. Более 7 месяцев она занимается купле- продажей продуктов питания. Имеет широкий ассортимент продуктов, а также много постоянных клиентов. Она всегда привозит свежие продукты. Муж является рабочим. Этим бизнесом она помогает мужу на содержание семьи. Бахтинисо запрашивает займ для покупки свежих продуктов с целью пополнения товарооборота. Она очень надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Bakhtiniso is a hard-working, kind, and honest woman. She is married and a loving mother of two children. For over 7 months she has been operating a grocery store. Bakhtiniso has a wide assortment of foodstuffs for sale, and also has many regular customers. The products she stocks are always fresh. Her husband is a labourer, and by running this business Bakhtiniso helps him provide for their family. She is requesting this loan to stock up on fresh products in order to increase her merchandise turnover. She hopes very much for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy food products

loans.name: Turemeshanye Group

texts.fr:
Odette fait partie du groupe Turemeshanye. Elle habite à Bujumbura, et a 38 ans. Elle est mariée à Joseph, un menuisier. Ensemble ils ont 3 enfants, âgés de 11 à 16 ans, tous  étudient. Un enfant est au  primaire, les deux autres à l’école secondaire.

Elle est  commerçante du riz depuis 7 ans. 

Elle est à son cinquième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et  acheter d'autres kilos de riz  à revendre, pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle voudrait  acheter une parcelle et construire une maison pour préparer la demeure future de ses enfants. 
,
texts.en:
Odette is part of the group Turemeshanye. She lives in Bujumbura and is 38 years old. She is married to Joseph, a furniture maker. Together they have three children, from 11 to 16 years old. All of them are students. One child is in primary school, and the other two are in secondary school. 

Odette has been a rice merchant for seven years. 

She is on her fifth loan from Turame. With the KIVA loan she is obtaining, she is going to increase her capital and buy more kilos of rice to resell, so as to earn more.

In the next few years, Odette would like to buy a parcel of land and build a house for her children's future residence.

loans.use: to increase her capital and to buy many kilos of rice

loans.name: Vitaliano

texts.es:
El señor Vitaliano vive en la  comunidad de Yunguillas que se encuentra a 18 kilómetros de la  provincia mizque del departamento  de Cochabamba, el señor Vitaliano con  47 años de edad tiene dos hijos, él desde muy pequeño por la pobreza y por el  abandono de sus padres empezó a trabajar como albañil y actualmente  se dedica a trabajar  en la agricultura produciendo verduras como ser Papa, Haba y Cebolla , por la distancia y lejanía  de su comunidad del pueblo vino vivir a la provincia  buscando  una mejor nivel  de vida para toda su familia, en el lugar donde vive solo cosechan una vez al año, a consecuencia que no cuentan con un pozo para el  riego y  tienen que esperar la época de la lluvia para sembrar sus productos, aun asi  con el esfuerzo de su trabajo mantiene a su familia. El destino del  crédito para la compra de   abono orgánico y semillas.
Entre sus sueños y metas esta que en su comunidad se perfore pronto un pozo para el riego y de esa manera el cliente y toda su comunidad puedan producir dos veces al año, con lo cual tendrá más utilidad para darle un mejor nivel de vida a su familia
texts.en:
Vitaliano lives in the community of Yunguillas which is located 18 kilometers from Mizque Province in Cochabamba Department.  Vitaliano is 47 years old and has two children.  Because of poverty and because he was abandoned by his parents, he started working as a bricklayer when he was very little.  He currently works in agriculture producing vegetables like potatoes, lima beans and onions.  Because his community was very far from the town he came to live in the province looking for a better standard of living for his entire family.  Where he lives there is only one harvest a year because they do not have an irrigation well and have to wait for the rainy season to plant.  Even so, with effort from his work he’s able to support his family.  The loan will be used to buy organic manure and seeds.

Among his dreams and goals is that an irrigation well is dug soon in his community so that he and all of his community will be able to have two yearly harvests which will lead to more profits to provide a better standard of living for his family.

loans.use: to buy organic manure and seeds.

loans.name: Mariziel

texts.en:
Mariziel is 21 years old, married, and has one child who is in school.

Mariziel is in the agricultural business farming vegetables in the Philippines. She requested a loan of PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers for her vegetable garden. Mariziel has been farming vegetables for three years now, and has borrowed two times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.  In the future, Mariziel would like to save enough to buy more farm land.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her vegetable garden.

loans.name: Urozali

texts.ru: Более 6 лет Урозали занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур и купле- продажей скота. Он очень трудолюбивый человек и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. В бизнесе помогает супруга. Урозали хотел бы получить займ в размере 7000 Сомони для покупки семян, минеральных удобрений, горюче- смазочных материалов и скота. Урозали надеется на вашу помощь и щедрость.
texts.en: Urozali has been growing crops and raising livestock for over 6 years. He is a very hard-working man. He is raising four children together with his wife, who also helps him with the business. Urozali would like to obtain a loan of 7000 somoni to purchase seeds, mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants, as well as livestock. Urozali hopes for your help and generosity.

loans.use: to buy seeds, mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants, and livestock

loans.name: Epifanio Rufino

texts.es:
Epifanio es un hombre trabajador y entusiasta a pesar de sus 54 años el tiene el espíritu de un joven de 20 años, es padre de 3 hijos a los cuales tuvo que criar solo ya que por una fatalidad perdió a su esposa y se convirtió en padre y madre para ellos,  a pesar de haber pasado por esta pena, aunque todavía siente en su corazón la ausencia de su esposa y compañera,  con mucha valentía y sacrificio empezó a trabajar mas duro cada dia para poder hacer que sus hijos sigan adelante y demostrarles que a pesar de las cosa tristes o malas que nos puedan pasan hay que salir adelante porque la vida sigue y sobre todo porque a pesar de que su esposa ya no estaba a su lado físicamente siempre va estar en sus corazones. Epifanio es pescador y es un oficio que le agrada mucho, aunque a él le hubiera gustado estudiar Ingeniería pesquera.

Es un buen pescador y ello gracias a la experiencia que él tiene en el mar, trabaja desde las 2 de la tarde y regresa a casa a las 6 de la mañana, es un trabajo duro pero a Epifanio le gusta mucho y sobre todo porque su padre es quien le enseño este oficio.

Epifanio está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar redes para pescar, ya que las que actualmente tiene están rotas y a veces no puede pescar muy bien debido a ello, con esta mejora el podrá pescar mucho mejor y así tener más producto para ofrecer, lo que mejorara sus ingresos, así seguirá luchando cada día para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su propia lancha”.
texts.en:
Epifanio is a hardworking, enthusiastic man who despite being 54 years old still has the spirit of a 20 year old.  He’s the father of three children who he had to raise alone because having lost his wife he became both father and mother to them.  Despite going through this sorrow and still feeling his wife and companion’s absence in his heart, with much valor and sacrifice he started to work even harder every day so that his children could get ahead and to show them that even though sad or bad things can happen to us one has to continue because life goes on and above all because even though his wife was no longer physically by their side she would always be in their hearts. 

Epifanio is a fisherman, an occupation he likes very much although he would have liked to study Fishing Engineering.  He is a good fisherman thanks to the experience he has in the sea.   He works from 2 in the afternoon until 6 in the morning.  It’s hard work but Epifanio likes it very much above all because his father taught him this occupation.

Epifanio is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they’ve given him he will be able to buy nets to fish with since the ones he has now are torn and sometimes he can’t fish very well because of that.  With this improvement he will fish much better and have more product to offer which will improve his income.  He will thus continue striving every day to make his great dream a reality:  “To have a boat of his own.”

loans.use: to buy nets.

loans.name: Salvacion

texts.en:
Salvacion is 43 years old, married, and has four children. With three children in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

Salvacion runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a loan of PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy more stocks to sell in her store.  Salvacion has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap, and other groceries. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell in her store.

loans.name: Luis Eduardo

texts.es: El Sr. Luis tiene 39 años y es casado con 1 hijos que tiene la edad de 16 años, el se dedica a la venta de ropa su venta la realiza de manera ambulante ofreciendo sus productos a distintas oficinas, domicilios, y mercados este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución El Sr. Luis utilizara  este préstamo para la  compra de diferentes modelos de ropa para su negocio, la  razón para solicitar este préstamo es aumento de inventario. Luis enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia de las ventas, el va a utilizar los beneficios del crédito llegando con el tiempo a tener  una tienda propia ya que su sueña por su negocio es administrar su propia tienda.
texts.en:
Luis is 39 years old and married, with one child who is 16 years old.  He works selling clothing.  He makes his sales as a street vendor, selling his products to different offices, homes, and markets.

This loan is his first cycle with the institution.  Luis will use this loan to buy different styles of clothing for his business.  The reason for requesting this loan is to expand his inventory.

The challenge Luis faces in his business is sales competition.  He is going to use the profits from the loan to, in time, have his own store, because his dream for his business is to manage his own store.

loans.use: to buy different styles of clothing.

loans.name: Gaby Guadalupe

texts.es:
Gaby es una joven muy entusiasta y alegre, tiene 25 años de edad y es madre de 2 pequeños de 1 y 6 añitos a los cuales ama muchísimo y por los que sale cada día con mucho ánimo ya que ella es madre y padre para ellos ya que su pareja los abandono, pero a pesar de eso ella siguió adelante porque para ella sus hijos son lo más importante. Su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Nazca, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener uno de los más grandes atractivos turísticos de nuestro país, el cual son las “Líneas de Nazca”, estas líneas están dibujadas en un extenso campo árido y que según algunos estudios habría servido como calendario para la cultura Nazca en siglos anteriores, también es conocido por su clima caluroso y sobre todo por la amabilidad de sus pobladores. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le encanta escuchar música asimismo aprovechar para comer uno de sus platos preferidos, el cual es el riquísimo “Escabeche”. Ella no pudo terminar de estudiar la carrera de derecho debido a los pocos recursos económicos de sus padres, por ello se esfuerza para que sus hijos sean mejores que ella.

Con mucho esfuerzo y ahorro Gaby logro comprar autos y por ello se dedica a su negocio de alquiler de automóviles para taxis; trabaja alrededor de 12 horas diarias, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque se esfuerza mucho para salir adelante ya que de ello depende que sus hijos sean personas de bien y eso es lo que la motiva cada día para hacer las cosas bien.

Gaby está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá realizar un mantenimiento y refacción a sus vehículos, así ella podrá alquilar vehículos seguros lo que ayudara a evitar accidentes y así los clientes sentirán mas confianza y seguirán alquilando sus autos, lo que le permitirá mejorar sus ingresos y seguir adelante y luchar por hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener una casa propia y que sus hijos sean personas de bien”.
texts.en:
Gaby is an enthusiastic and cheerful young woman.  She is 25 years old and the mother of two small children, who are one and six years old.  She loves them very much and it is for their sake that she goes out every day motivated because she is both mother and father for them since her spouse abandoned them.  However, in spite of all that, she got ahead because her children are the most important thing to her.  Her home is in the city of Nazca, a city that is known for having one of the biggest tourist attractions in the country, the Nazca Lines.  These lines are drawn over an vast expanse of desert and, according to some studies, they would have served as a calendar for the Nazca culture in centuries past.  It is also known for its hot climate and, above all, for the friendliness of its inhabitants.  When she has free time she loves to listen to music and to take the opportunity to eat one of her favorite dishes, the delicious escabeche.  She wasn't able to finish her legal studies because her parents didn't have enough money.  This is why she is working hard, so that her children will be better than she is.

With much effort and saving, Gaby was able to buy cars and so she has a business renting cars for taxi services.  She works around 12 hours a day.  She thinks her business is going well because she puts a lot of effort into getting ahead since her children's well-being depends on it.  This is what motivates her to do things well every day.

Gaby is very thankful to Kiva's lenders, as it is thanks to the help they have given her that she can perform maintenance on her cars and refurbish them.  This will allow her to rent safe vehicles, which will help her avoid accidents and which will make her customers feel safer and keep renting her cars.  This will allow her to improve her income and get ahead and fight to make her greatest dream a reality: to have her own home and for her children to be respectable people.

loans.use: to perform vehicle maintenance and repairs

loans.name: Baby Jasmin

texts.en:
Baby Jasmin is 33 years old, married, and has three children who are currently going to school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Baby Jasmin has a tailoring business in the Philippines. She requested a loan of PHP 10,000 amount through NWTF to buy new tools and equipment for her tailoring business. She has been in this business for three years. Baby Jasmin would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy new tools and equipment for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Edson Ronald

texts.es: El señor Edson tiene 21 años de edad y vive en una casa de propiedad de sus padres, vivienda que está ubicada en la comunidad de Tolomosa grande zona rural de la ciudad de Tarija. Edson es soltero y  no tiene  hijos solo hermanos menores a quienes ayuda en sus estudios, Edson desde hace varios años que se dedica a la producción de verduras. Ahora él tiene que trabajar para poder salir adelante junto con sus hermanos menores. Edson es una persona muy responsable y conocido por sus clientes que compran sus productos, nos cuenta que quiere tener mejores ingresos para salir adelante, es por  eso tiene la necesidad de comprar plantines de frutilla,  ya que tiene varios años de experiencia en el rubro. Por lo tanto el destino del crédito es   para la compra de dichos plantines que son necesarios para realizar su actividad y de ese modo poder incrementar sus ingresos económicos.                                                                                                                                                                                                        Edson  nos cuenta que quiere mejorar las condiciones de vida que tiene, por eso nos dice que el próximo crédito que solicite será para mejorar las condiciones de la casa donde vive.
texts.en:
Edson, 21, lives in a house his parents own located in the community of Tolomosa Grande, a rural zone in the city of Tarija.  Edson is single and has no children just younger siblings he helps with their schooling.  

Edson has worked producing vegetables for several years.  He needs to work in order to get ahead along with his younger siblings.  Edson is a very responsible person who is well known by his customers that buy his products.  He tells us that he wants to earn better income in order to get ahead and that’s why he needs to buy strawberry seedlings since he has several years’ experience in this line of work.  Therefore, the loan will be used to buy said plants that he needs in order to carry out his activity and be able to increase his income.

Edson tells us that he wants to improve his living conditions and this is why he tells us that the next loan he asks for will be to improve the conditions of the house he lives in.

loans.use: to buy strawberry seedlings.

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es: Alfredo tiene 25 años de edad, dos hijos en edad escolar, su esposa es Gilda, él proviene de La Misión,  un pueblo indígena Yuracaré, se vino a la ciudad de Cochabamba para estudiar el bachillerato hace 10 años atrás, vive en habitaciones alquiladas a 6 kilómetros de la ciudad , actualmente se dedica a la actividad del transporte es chofer manejando  una movilidad ajena, su actividad es diaria desde las 5 de la mañana hace rutas específicas en las zonas periféricas y el mercado central, quiere mejorar sus condiciones de vida, necesita capital de operación para la actividad de la esposa que vende zapatillas en el mercado central  en los días de feria que son los Miércoles y Sábados también vende frutas de la temporada (durazno, palta, uvas),  los martes jueves y domingo en la zona norte de la ciudad en la puerta del mercado de la zona américa.
texts.en: Alfredo, 25, has two school age children; his wife is Gilda.  He’s from La Misión, a Yuracaré indigenous town.  He came to the city of Cochabamba to go to high school ten years ago.  He lives in rented rooms six kilometers from the city.  He currently works as a transportation driver driving a vehicle that belongs to someone else.  His daily activity starts at 5am and he travels specific routes along peripheral zones and the central market.  He wants to improve his living conditions and needs working capital for his wife’s activity which is selling sandals in the central market on market days which are Wednesdays and Saturdays; she also sells seasonal fruit (peaches, avocado and grapes) Tuesdays and Sundays in the north of the city at the entrance to the market in América zone.

loans.use: to buy sandals.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es:
Josefina es una mujer de 45 años de edad, soltera y con dos hijos a cargo. Su domicilio está situado en la zona de Carrasquillo, en el distrito de Buenos Aires, Morropón.  Tiene buenas referencias laborales y personales y los pobladores de su zona son trabajadores y respetuosos.
La actividad a la que se dedica Josefina es la venta de chicha de jora y cerveza en la zona desde hace más de 5 años. Debido a las grandes fiestas patronales y celebraciones casuales, se hace necesaria la presencia de un abastecedor de bebidas como estas para las celebraciones.
El monto del crédito solicitado asciende a 3000 nuevos soles, los cuales los invertirá en la compra de insumos para la chicha de jora, tales como el maíz duro; la compra de cerveza y el arreglo de su domicilio, para hacer más vistosa la tienda donde se distribuyen las bebidas.
texts.en:
Josefina is a 45 year old woman, single with two children in her care.  Her address is in the Carrasquillo zone in Buenos Aires District, Morropón.  She has good work and personal references and residents in her zone are hardworking and respectful.

Josefina has sold “chicha de jora” [corn based beverage] and beer in the zone for more than five years.  Due to the great patron saint festivities and casual celebrations a beverage supplier’s presence is necessary for these events.

The amount of the requested loan is 3000 new soles that she will use to buy ingredients for the chicha de jora like hominy, to buy beer and also to make the store where she sells the beverages more eye-catching.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make chicha de jora, to buy beer and to make improvements to her locale.

loans.name: Julian

texts.es:
Julián es un hombre de 54 años de edad, conviviente y con 2 hijos. Vive en el sector El Palmo, en el distrito de Cayaltí. Este sector es una comunidad grande dentro de la zona urbana.
La actividad a la que se dedica Julián es a la carpintería; fabrica sillas, camas, carpetas, marcos para ventanas y cualquier otro mueble. Tiene su taller en su domicilio y ejerce este oficio desde hace 20 años, fabricando muebles para sus vecinos y para cualquier cliente que quiera su trabajo.
El monto del préstamo solicitado es de 1000 nuevos soles, los cuales se destinarán a la adquisición de madera y otros insumos para la fabricación de los muebles. De esta manera, Julián quiere hacer crecer su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Julián, 54, has a spouse and two children.  He lives in the El Palmo sector in the city of Cayaltí.  This sector is a large community within the urban zone.

Julián’s activity is carpentry.  He manufactures chairs, beds, desks, window frames and any other kind of furniture.  His shop is at home and he’s been in this occupation for 20 years manufacturing furniture for his neighbors and any customer who wants his work.

The amount of the requested loan is 1000 new soles that he will use to buy lumber and other supplies for furniture making.  In this way Julián wants to make his business grow and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy lumber and other furniture making supplies.

loans.name: Lucena

texts.en:
Lucena works hard to support her family. Lucena is married and has a rope retail business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks to sell like rope, native hats, etc.

Lucena has been in this business for 7 years. In the future, Lucena would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like rope, native hats, etc.

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is 56 years old and married. She has five children. Delia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

Delia has borrowed and repaid 4 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 15 years and also earns an income from a trisikad (moped) and motorcycle transport.

Delia aspires to save money to expand her business and to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks to sell.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is a married woman. She has four children with ages ranging from 3 years to 17 years. She describes herself to be sociable and friendly. She operates a beauty salon where she provides hair services. She has been involved in this business for 10 years. Her business is located at a fast growing busy shoppping centre and her primary customers are local residents. 

Rose describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving the business. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more hair and beauty products. Her business goal is to run several salons  within five years.

loans.use: to buy hair and beauty products.

loans.name: Maria Jenny

texts.en:
Maria Jenny is 47 years old and married. She has 5 children. Maria Jenny works hard to provide for her family. She runs a variety store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 19,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items like shampoo, canned goods and other groceries.

Maria Jenny has borrowed and repaid 7 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the variety store for 3 years and also earns an income from trisikad (pedicab) and motorcycle transport.

Maria Jenny aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items like shampoo, canned goods and other groceries.

loans.name: Mauricia

texts.en:
Mauricia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

Mauricia has been in this business for 8 years. She earns additional income from food vending. Mauricia has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Nympha

texts.en:
Nympha is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a making and selling vinegar business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to buy containers and other raw materials for the storage of vinegar.

Nympha has been in this business for 5 years. Nympha earns additional income from food vending. Nympha has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to build a house for her family in the future.

loans.use: to buy containers and other raw materials for the storage of vinegar.

loans.name: Emelda

texts.en:
Emelda is married with four children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Emelda is 44 years old and three of her children are in school.

Emelda has a variety store business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 11,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy items like shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell in her variety store.

Emelda has been in this business for two years. In the future, Emelda would like to save enough to ensure financial stability for her family.

loans.use: to buy items like shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell in her sari-sari (variety) store.

loans.name: Lorenzo

texts.es:
Lorenzo es un hombre de 36 años de edad, es casado y tiene 2 hijos a su cargo. Tiene casa propia ubicada en la localidad de La Matanza. Cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales. La mayoría de casas en su zona son aún rústicas.
Lorenzo se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores, tales como ovejas, chivos y otros desde hace 4 años en el sector de Cruz Verde, caserío que esta a 5 minutos del distrito de La Matanza, así mismo se dedica a la agricultura.Uno de sus objetivos principales es lograr cosechar  el sembrío de la mejor manera y vender a un buen precio los animales menores, para ello el cliente se dedica diariamente a su negocio y sobre todo trabaja con mucha responsabilidad y dedicación.
El monto del crédito invertido es de 2010 nuevos soles que serán invertidos en la compra de insecticidas para su parcela de chileno, además para el arreglo del corral de los animales, para que de esa forma tenga mejores ingresos y en consecuencia una mejor condición de vida en la zona.
texts.en:
Lorenzo, 36, is married and has two children in his care.  He owns his house located in La Matanza.  He has very good personal and work-related references.  Most of the houses in his zone are rustic.

Lorenzo has been working raising and selling small farm animals like sheep, goats and others for four years in Cruz Verde, a hamlet five minutes from La Matanza district; he also farms.  One of his main objectives is to obtain better harvests and to sell his animals at better prices.  To do so, he works hard every day with much responsibility and dedication.

The amount requested is 2010 new soles that he will use to buy insecticide for his crops and also to repair his animal corrals so that income will be better and as a result improved living conditions in the zone.

loans.use: to buy pesticide and to repair corrals.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose lives in Kampala, Uganda.  She is widowed and has three children, all of whom are in school.  She also takes care of additional family members. 

Rose has a retail shop.  She has been in this business for 10 years, and she works 7 days out of every week.  Rose sells her products at the market, retail. She has requested a loan of 1,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more bags of sugar, cartons of salt, jerrycans of cooking oil, a bag of rice and bread.  She also generates additional income through cooked food vending.

The main business challenges for Rose include seasonality and ever increasing prices of commodities in Uganda.  Her goals and aspirations for her business are to become a wholesaler and to build rental rooms. Rose lives in a home that she rents; she has access to electricity and piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include   school fees and rent.

loans.use: To buy more bags of sugar, cartons of salt, jerrycans of cooking oil, rice and bread

loans.name: Maviş Group

texts.en:
Zeynep is 32 years old and was born in Eskişehir. She is married with one child. Her husband is a taxi driver. Zeynep is a  very sociable woman. She has good relationships with the people around her. She thinks that a woman should work, not stay at home. She established the idea that “before you consume, you need to produce” as her principle in life and has even spread this idea to her neighbours. She has been a member of Maya for two years. 

After building her group, she and the group members have been doing various work, in order to contribute to meeting their families’ expenses. Zeynep didn’t have a chance to  be educated, but it can be said that she is a non-educated artist. They have been creating very nice handicrafts and decorating items which can be regarded as pieces of art. While doing the sales of the art works via internet, now with the support of Maya, they opened a shop. 

Zeynep has been selling the items she makes herself and the other group members' creations in this shop. With this loan, she will buy supplies. She is a good mother, a good wife and of course a good businesswoman. She has been a role model for her family and her child.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Volunteers

Zeynep , 27/10/1979 Eskişehir doğumlu. Evli ve bir çocuk annesi. Eşi ticari bir takside şöförlük yapan Zeynep Hanım, çok sosyal bir kadın. Çevresindekilerle iletişimi son derece iyi olan Zeynep Hanım, asla bir kadının evde çalışmadan oturmasını doğru bulmuyor. Tüketmek için önce üretmek gerek düşüncesini kendisine prensip olarak belirlemiş ve hatta etrafındaki komşularına kadar bu fikri aşılamış. 2 senedir Maya’nın üyesi ve kendi grubunu oluşturduktan sonra çok çeşitli işler yaparak aile bütçelerine katkıda bulunuyorlar. Zeynep Hanım, aslında eğitim alamamış, okullu değil ama alaylı bir sanatçı demek yanlış olmaz o kadar güzel el işleri ve süs eşyaları yapıyorlarki bunların her biri  sanat eseri. El emeği göz nuru ile yapılan bu ürünlerin internet üzerinden satışını yaparken bunun yanında şimdi yine mayanında desteğiyle küçük ama çok sevimli bir dükkan açtı. Hem kendisinin hemde grup üyelerinin ürünlerinin satışını burdan yapıyor. Maya’dan aldığı kredi ile ürünler alacak. Ailesi ve özellikle çocuğununun   azim ,başarı örneği olarak aldığı Zeynep Hanım, iyi bir anne,iyi bir eş ve tabi ki iyi bir iş kadını.
.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her handicrafts and decorating items

loans.name: Lucero

texts.es:
Lucero es una mujer de 36 años de edad, casada y tiene un hijo. Vive en el Sector Ramón Castilla, en el distrito de Cayaltí. Vive con su esposo el cual está delicado de salud. Tiene un gran carisma que le permite entablar buenas relaciones con sus vecinos.
Lucero se dedica a la venta de comida y golosinas en el parque principal de Cayaltí, y a la venta de productos de belleza en las zonas aledañas.
El préstamo ascendente a 1000 soles, será empleado para adquirir insumos para la preparación de la comida y golosinas, tales como caramelos, galletas, chupetines, los cuales comercializará en el parque de Cayaltí. Además, también empleará el dinero en la compra de productos de belleza para poderlos comercializar en su sector y en zonas aledañas. 
Lucero trabaja esforzadamente para elevar su calidad de vida y para comprar las medicinas que necesita su esposo enfermo.
texts.en:
Lucero, 36, is a married woman; she has a son.  She lives in Cayaltí District’s Ramón Castilla Sector.  She lives with her husband who is in poor health.  She has great charisma which allows her to establish good relationships with her neighbors.

Lucero sells food and snacks in Cayaltí’s main park and she sells beauty products in adjacent areas.

The loan is for 1000 soles that she will use to buy ingredients for food preparation and snacks like candy, cookies and lollipops that she’ll sell in the park in Cayaltí.  She will also use the money to buy beauty products to sell in her neighborhood and in adjacent zones.

Lucero works hard to raise her quality of life and to buy the medicines her sick husband needs.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for food preparation, snacks to sell and also beauty products.

loans.name: Luz Aurora

texts.es:
Luz es una mujer de 26 años de edad, vive con su conviviente y sus 3 hijos. Vive en el sector de Badajos, en el distrito de Cayaltí.
Luz se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza a sus allegados o clientes, para lo cual se sabe se necesita de un buen capital para que el negocio se configure como una buena inversión.
Al no tener algún sustento adicional, se le hace necesario solicitar un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles, cuyo fin será la adquisición de más productos de belleza, cuya venta contribuirá a elevar y mejorar su calidad de vida.
Luz es una mujer emprendedora con ganas de salir adelante y colaborar con el crecimiento económico de su hogar.
texts.en:
Luz, 26, lives with her spouse and three children in Cayaltí District’s Badajos sector.  She sells beauty products to acquaintances and customers that she needs good capital for so that the business will become a good investment.

Not having any other means of support, she needs to ask for a 1000 new sol loan to buy more beauty products the sale of which will help elevate and improve her quality of life.

Luz is an enterprising woman with the desire to get ahead and contribute to her home’s economic growth.

loans.use: to buy beauty products to sell via catalogue.

loans.name: Maria Augusta

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 63 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene un hijo a su cargo. Vive en casa propia, la cual está ubicada en  el  Caserío Tupac Inca Yupanqui en el Distrito de Tambogrande. Vive en la parte rural del distrito y sólo cuenta con servicio de luz eléctrica.
La actividad que desarrolla María es la ganadería, teniendo animales varios, como ovinos, porcinos y aves de corral, los cuales cría y engorda en la parte posterior de su domicilio, para luego comercializarlos en mercado local. Esta actividad la desarrolla hace mas de 10 años. Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura contando con 1 hectárea de terreno agrícola sembrado de mango y limón en producción, generándole ingresos para cubrir gastos crediticios y apoyar canasta familiar.
El monto del crédito asciende a 2000 nuevos soles, los cuales serán destinados a la adquisición de más ganados similares a los que ya posee y para la compra de fertilizantes para sus terrenos agrícolas.
texts.en:
María, 63, has a spouse and a son in her care.  She lives in her own house located the Tupac Inca Yupanqui hamlet in Tambogrande District.  She lives in the rural part of the district and only has electricity.

María’s activity is raising livestock.  She has various animals like sheep, pigs and barnyard fowl that she raises and fattens up in her back yard to then sell in the local market.  She’s been in this line of work for more than ten years.  Her husband is a farmer; he has one hectare of farmland planted with mangoes and lemons that generate income to cover loan costs and contribute to the family’s basic needs.

The loan is for 2000 new soles that will be used to buy livestock similar to what she already has and to buy fertilizer for her fields.

loans.use: to buy livestock and fertilizer.

loans.name: Elda Micaela

texts.es:
La señora Elda Micaela, es madre de 4 hijos pero solamente 1 a su cargo, casada, originaria de la ciudad de león; inicia sus actividades a las 7:00 am donde prepara los batidos a clientes del mercado la terminal. 
Inició su negocio en el mercado la terminal con un capital de $500.00 gracias al aporte de su esposo para la mantención de su hogar y dejar un poco el trabajo anterior que era ser costurera.

El crédito brindado por CEPRODEL a la señora Elda será utilizado para la  compra de 6 combos de productos Herbalife y así poder satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes logrando incrementar sus ventas que le ayudaran a mejorar su calidad de vida.

Se siente agradecida porque anteriormente ha realizado créditos con Ceprodel y le han ayudado a incrementar su capital de trabajo permitiendo mejorar sus condiciones de vida de toda su familia.
texts.en:
Elda Micaela is the mother of four children, but only one is her dependent.  She is married and comes from the city of León.  She starts work at 7:00 a.m., when she makes shakes for her customers at the La Terminal market.

She started her business at the La Terminal market with $500 in capital thanks to her husband's contribution in taking care of the house and to her taking some time off from her previous work, which was sewing.

The loan CEPRODEL offered Elda will be used to buy six combos of Herbalife products, which will allow her to meet her customers' needs and increase her sales, which will help her improve her quality of life.

She is grateful because she has taken out loans with CEPRODEL before and they have helped her increase her working capital, allowing her to improve her whole family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy six combos of Herbalife products

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.en:
33-year-old Svetlana is engaged in animal breeding and land cultivation. She is raising four cows and four calves, and she also has 10 chickens. On her own plot of land Svetlana grows potatoes to sell and oats. Part of the milk, eggs and meat are used for her family’s needs. Svetlana uses oats as a fodder for her cows and chickens. 

Svetlana lives in Lchachen village, Gegharkunik region. She is married and has two children: a 5-year-old son and a 10-year-old daughter. Svetlana’s husband works as a salesperson in a butcher’s shop. Her mother-in-law who is a pensioner also lives with Svetlana. 

Svetlana sells the dairy products she produces to re-sellers and her husband sells meat from their farm at the butcher’s shop where he works. Svetlana’s husband and mother-in-law help Svetlana with farming and thus they support their little family.

Svetlana is asking for a $ 2,000 loan to buy some calves for her farm and also additional fodder for her farm animals.

loans.use: to buy some calves for her farm and also fodder for her farm animals

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim is a married man. He has eight children with ages ranging from 7 years to 16 years. He describes himself to be ambitious and outgoing. He operates a store where he sells shoes, wallets, etc. He has been involved in this business for four years. His business is located at a fast growing, busy market. He describes his biggest business challenge to be inadequate funds to improve the business.

Ibrahim will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy raw materials for making shoes and wallets. His business goal is to be a supplier of shoes and wallets within five years.

loans.use: to buy leather and raw materials to make wallets and shoes.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca lives in Kampala, Uganda.  She is married and has seven children, three of whom are in school. She also takes care of additional family members (her father).  

Rebecca has a business selling sugarcane. She has been in this business for 10 years, and she works 7 days out of every week. She sells her products at the market, retail. Rebecca has requested a loan of 900,000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more bundles of sugar cane.  
   
The main business challenges for Rebecca include seasonality and thieves. Her goals and aspirations are to become a wholesaler and to build her own house. Rebecca lives in a home that she rents; she has access to electricity and piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include   school fees and rent.

loans.use: To buy more bundles of sugar cane

loans.name: Linda

texts.en: Linda is 44 years old and is a married woman with four children ages 11, 13, 16 and 18. She is a farmer from Trinidad, Bohol. Linda grows rice crops to sell. She also raises pigs for fattening and sale. Linda has requested a loan to purchase fertilizers, piglets and feed. She hopes to help elevate her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, piglets and feed

loans.name: Nemesia

texts.en:
Ms. Nemesia is 57 years old and lives in Bocator, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental. She is married with seven children. 

Ms. Nemesia works in the fish industry and sells dried fish for a living. She has been doing this for three years. She has requested a loan to to buy dried fish. 

Ms. Nemesia has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Ms. Nemesia hopes to improve her family's living conditions using the profits of the business.

loans.use: to buy dried fish for resale

loans.name: Martina

texts.en:
Martina earns a living by raising pigs. She is a 58-year-old married woman who lives in the town of San Miguel, Bohol with her family. Martina's husband works as a farmer.

Martina has had her business for eight years. She earns 2,000 PHP per month raising pigs. Martina is requesting a loan to purchase feed and vitamins. She hopes to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins

loans.name: Nica

texts.en:
Nica is a 20-year-old single woman from Trinidad, Bohol. She runs a sari-sari (variety) store business to support her family and save for her college education. Nica sells various items like soap, canned goods, vinegar and soy sauce. She earns about 4000 PHP per month with her business.

Nica is requesting a loan to buy more items to sell such as rice, canned goods, and medicines. Nica hopes that through her business, she will be able to achieve her dreams.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell such as rice, canned goods, and medicines

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
Ms. Daisy is married  with three children. She is 33 years old and lives in Paiton, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental.

Ms. Daisy sells many kinds of grocery goods to earn a living and has had this business for six years. Each month, she earns PHP 5,000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 14,900 PHP to buy more grocery goods for the sari-sari (variety) store.

Ms. Daisy has been a member of PMPC for two years.  In the future, Ms. Daisy hopes to improve her family's living conditions by using the profits of the business.

loans.use: to buy grocery goods for her grocery "sari-sari" store

loans.name: Nilda

texts.en:
Nilda is 32 years old and is a married woman with five children ages 4, 6, 9, 12 and 14. Her husband works as a farmer.

Nilda is also a farmer working in San Miguel, Bohol. She has been growing and selling rice for 14 years. Nilda does her best to assist her husband in providing for their needs and sending their children to school. She requested a loan to purchase fertilizers and insecticides. Nilda hopes to earn better and be able to pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and insecticides

loans.name: Nubia Constantina

texts.es:
La señora Nubia Constantina en originaria del departamento de León, es madre soltera, Inicia a exhibir su mercancía a las 7:00 am y finalizando sus labores a las 12:00 pm.

Inicio su negocio con venta de concentrados para animales con un capital de trabajo con C$ 3,000.00 córdobas producto ahorros. 
La señora Nubia compra al por mayor productos tales como: Arroz, Azúcar, Maíz, etc.

Cabe mencionar que la demanda ha aumentado y por ello está solicitando un crédito para la compra de los granos para su respectiva comercialización tanto al detalle como al por mayor y así obtener mayores  ingresos para mejor su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Nubia Constantina is from the department of León.  She is a single mother.  She starts showing her merchandise at 7:00 a.m. and finishes her work at 12:00 p.m.

She began her business selling animal feed with working capital of 3,000 córdobas (NIO), product of savings.  Nubia buys wholesale products such as rice, sugar, corn, etc.

It is worth mentioning that demand has increased and this is why she is requesting a loan to buy the grains to sell both retail and wholesale, and so get greater income to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn, wheat, rice, beans, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en: Wilson is a married man. He has a son who is 4 years old. He describes himself to be patient. He operates a beauty salon where he provides hair services. He has been involved in this business for 7 years. His business is located near a busy market and his primary customers are women. He describes his biggest business challenge to be stiff competition within the area. He will use the Kes 30,000 loan to buy more beauty hair products. His business goal is to run a bigger salon.

loans.use: to buy more beauty hair products.

loans.name: Elena Regina

texts.es: La Sra. Elena tiene 34 años y es casada con 5 hijos que son de las edades de  17-15-10-5 y 2 años,  Ella se dedica a la venta de  comida, en una pensión que se encuentra en su mismo domicilio,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  Elena utilizara este préstamo para la compra de mescladora de cemento para realizar la  construcción de su casa y también de su negocio,  Elena enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia ya que en la zona existen varias pensiones pero la Sra. Elena tiene mucha clientela por la buena elaboración de sus platillos y por la amabilidad con que atiende a sus clientes, Ella utilizara los beneficios del crédito en mejorar su casa, la Sra. Elena es un apersona muy trabajadora trabaja mucho para sacar a sus cinco hijos adelante ya que este es su único objetivo el de ver a sus hijos profesionales.
texts.en: Elena is 34 years old and married. She has five children, aged 17, 15, 10 , 5 and 2 years. She earns her living selling prepared meals from a business located in her home. This is her first loan with Kiva's partner. Elena will use this loan to purchase a cement mixer with which to complete the construction of her home and of her business site, as well. The challenges she faces in her business include competition, since several catering type business like Elena's are now located in her area. Elena has a lot of clients, however,  thanks to how well she prepares her dishes and to the kindness with which she attends to her clients. She will use the money from the loan to improve her house.  Elena is a very hardworking woman. She works so hard in order to help her children get ahead, since her only objective is to see her children become professionals.

loans.use: To buy a cement mixer to use in the construction of her home.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: Luis de 57 años de edad  vive con su cónyuge y  3 hijos en las edades de 19 a 30 años en el municipio de San Juan Nepomuceno, donde está al frente de un negocio familiar, en el que  ofrece el servicio de juegos de billar y es atendido por dos hermanos, que aprendieron esta actividad de su padre, quien aun vive y son ellos quienes atienden el billar, generando el sustento de su familia. Su meta es tener  mas mesas y arreglar todos los pisos del local, pero su capital de trabajo resulta insuficiente para lograr este propósito. Esta es la razón por la cual acude  a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará cemento y materiales variados para arreglar el piso del local y también reparará las mesas ; todo esto con el fin de brindar un ambiente confortable a sus clientes y generar un potencial de ingresos superior , pues el propósito  de esta inversión es despertar un mayor interés de sus clientes potenciales  en  visitar el establecimiento y utilizar sus servicios, lo cual hace que esta inversión tenga éxito.
texts.en: Luis is 57 years old and lives with his partner and 3 children, who are 19 to 30 years old, in the municipality of San Juan Nepomuceno. He is the head of a family business where he offers the services of billiards games. It is tended by two brothers, who learned the business from their father, who is still alive. They tend to the billiards business, generating the income for their family. His goal is to have more tables and to fix all the floors in the business, but his working capital isn’t sufficient do this. This is why he is turning to a Kiva loan, which is the first loan he has taken with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. He will use it to buy cement and a variety of materials for fixing the floor and he will also repair the tables. All of this is for the goal of providing his customers with a comfortable atmosphere and to generate a higher potential income. The purpose of this investment is to make his potential customers more interested in visiting the business and using his services, which is what will make this investment a success.

loans.use: to buy cement and a variety of materials for fixing the floor and he will also repair his billiard tables

loans.name: Irenea

texts.en:
Ms. Irenea is married with 6 children. She is 44 years old and lives in Sicot,Tangub City, Misamis Occidental.
Ms. Irenea sells fruits and vegetables to earn a living and has had this business for 10 years. Each month, she earns PHP 5,000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 7,000 to buy more fruits and vegetables.
Ms. Irenea has been a member of PMPC for 2 years. In the future, she hope to improve their living conditions by using the profits of the business.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables for her Bagsakan (food terminal) business

loans.name: Olimjon

texts.ru: Олимчон разведен и на воспитании имеет двух сыновей. Более 15 лет он занимается предоставлением услуг такси на собственной автомашине. Имеет хороший опыт в своем бизнесе. Имеет недостроенный дом и с этой целью Олимчон запрашивает займ в размере 12000 Сомони чтобы достроить свой дом. Олимчон надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Olimjon is divorced and is raising two sons. For over 15 years, he has been using his own vehicle to offer taxi services and has acquired extensive experience in this business. Olimjon is in the process of building his new home and is requesting a loan of 12000 somoni to finish construction. He is hoping for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to finish building his house

loans.name: Kholdor

texts.ru: Холдор добрый и трудолюбивый человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Более 10 лет он занимается предоставлением транспортных услуг. Предоставляет услугу по местному маршруту. Имеет хорошую репутацию и кредитную историю. Холдор запрашивает займ для ремонта своего автомобиля. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Kholdor is a kind and hard-working person. He is married and is raising three children. For over 10 years, he has been offering transportation services along local routes. Kholdor has a good reputation and a solid credit history. He is requesting this loan to repair his vehicle. Kholdor is hoping for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to repair his vehicle

loans.name: June Gee

texts.en:
Ms. June Gee is married with 2 children. She is 27 years old and lives in Sta. Cruz, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental.
To earn a living, Ms. June Gee has a clothing business and needs the loan to to buy more clothes for her clothing business. She has had this business for 3 years. Each month, she earns approximately PHP 5,500. Ms. June Gee has been a member of PMPC for 3 years.
In the future, she hopes to improve her living conditions by using the profits of the business.

loans.use: to buy more clothes for her clothing business

location.town: Tangub-Sta. Cruz, Tangub, City, Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Dona María

texts.es: Dona con su anterior credikiva, compró  suéteres para caballeros, pantalones jeans para damas, cubrelechos y los vendió rápidamente. Con ello su capital de trabajo se incrementó y ahora está aplicando nuevamente a un credikiva, con el cual comprará   electrodomésticos menores, ropa femenina casual y deportiva entre otros artículos que le han encargado sus clientes. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: “Gracias…. que sigan prestando a mas clientes, para poder salir adelante” Dona se siente muy agradecida con su credikiva porque los plazos le resultan cómodos y es fácil de pagar.
texts.en:
With her previous Kiva loan, Dona bought men's sweaters, women's jeans, and bedspreads, and they sold quickly. With that her business capital increased and now she is asking for a new Kiva loan which she will use to purchase small appliances, casual women's clothing and athletic wear, among other things that her customers have ordered. 

Her message to the Kiva lenders is the following: "Thank you, keep lending to more clients so that they can get ahead." Dona is very grateful for her Kiva loan because the repayment terms are reasonable and easy to make.

loans.use: to buy small household appliances and women's casual and athletic clothing.

loans.name: Cinthia Monica

texts.es:
Cinthia es una joven madre de 21 años de edad, su pequeña hija a la cual adora mucho tiene tan solo 2 añitos, es muy traviesa pero siempre le roba una sonrissa cuando hace alguna gracia, junto a ella también vive su esposo el cual es su brazo derecho y es muy trabajador casi siempre tiene 2 trabajos ya que tanto ella como su esposo buscan que su hija tenga una buena calidad de vida. Su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Imperial,. Ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido en cualquier época del año, asimismo es una ciudad que tiene como actividad principal la agricultura y sobre todo por la generosidad de sus pobladores. Cinthia anteriormente trabajaba en el campo, pero con mucho esfuerzo, ahorro y el apoyo de su esposo decidió tener el negocio de venta de abarrotes,  ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque dios esta con ella siempre tanto en las buenas como en las malas y le ha dado el mejor regalo que una persona puede tener que es su hija y por ello ella lucha cada día para salir adelante y que los clientes se sientan a gusto en su negocio.

Cinthia está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar andamios, mostradores y vitrinas, ya que actualmente ella cuelga los productos en unos clavos que tiene en la pared y en un pequeño mostrador que le construyo su esposo pero ya esta viejito, con esta mejora ella podrá mostrar sus productos de mejor manera y tener su negocio más ordenado, con ello los clientes verán que su negocio es limpio y tendrán mucha más confianza en comprar sus productos, asi seguirá trabajando día a día para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Darle una buena educación a su hija y verla convertida en toda una profesional”.
texts.en:
Cinthia is a young mother who is 21years old. Her young daughter, who she adores very much, is only 2 years old and is very mischievous but can always win a smile when she does something funny. Her husband also lives with her. He is her “right hand” and is very hardworking and almost always has two jobs. She and her husband want for their daughter to have a good quality of life. Their house is located in the city of Imperial. This city is known for having a hot climate in every season of the year. It is also a city that has agriculture as its main economic activity and the people are very generous. Cinthia used to work in the fields, but with a lot of hard work, saving, and the support of her husband, she decided to have a business that sells grocery items. She thinks things are going well for her business because God is always with her, in the good and the bad. And He has given her the best gift that a person could have, which is her daughter. She works every day to help her get ahead and also so that her customers will feel comfortable in her business.

Cinthia is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to the support they’ve provided her she will be able to buy shelves, counters, and vitrines. Currently she hangs her products from nails in the wall and from a small counter that her husband built for her, but it is old now. With these improvements she will be able to show her products in a better way and have her business better organized. Then her customers will see that her business is clean and they will feel more confident in buying her products. That way she can continue working every day to make her big dream a reality: “To give her daughter a good education and to see her become a professional.”

loans.use: to buy shelves, vitrines, and mostradores.

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna, who is 44 years old, lives in Ddmashen village, Gegharkunik region, where she runs an agricultural business. Anna has a plot of land where she grows potatoes and wheat to sell. Anna also breeds some cows, pigs, and chickens. Periodically, Anna and her husband rent a car and move their agricultural produce to Sevan and Hrazdan cities’ markets where they sell produced dairy products, eggs, potato and wheat. Anna sells the meat to re-sellers directly from her farm. 
She has two sons, the younger one is serving in the Armenian army and the older one has recently returned from the army and now helps Anna on the farm. 
Farming is the only source of income for Anna’s family so Anna intends to develop it. Therefore, she is asking for a $1,300 loan to buy potato seedlings and fertilizer ahead of the sowing season. 
This is Anna’s fourth loan from Nor Horizon and she has never delayed her repayments.

loans.use: to buy potato seedlings and fertilizer ahead of the sowing season

loans.name: Mirian Johana

texts.es:
Mirian es una joven muy alegre y atenta, vive en la ciudad de Nazca , ciudad conocida por su clima cálido, asimismo en esta ciudad se ubio una  de las culturas pre incas mas importantes de nuestro país que es la grandiosa cultura Nazca, sobre todo porque dejaron como legado uno de los atractivos turístico más importantes del país que son las Líneas de Nazca; son dibujos inmensos ubicados en un extenso campo de tierra árida y que según algunos estudios sirvieron como un calendario astronómico para la cultura Nazca. A Miriam le gusta mucho la música pro eso en tu tiempo libre le encanta descansar escuchándola; asimismo le gusta degustar uno de sus platos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz con pollo”. Debido a los pocos recursos económicos de sus padres ella solo tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Ingeniería de Alimentos.

Cada día Miriam se levanta con mucho entusiasmo para trabajar en su negocio de venta de Ropa para damas; ella le dedica alrededor de 9 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 15 clientes en el día, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y porque siempre tienen una sonrisa para ellos y por ello los clientes se sienten a gusto.

Miriam está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado, ella podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio en especial blusas, pantalones, polos para dama entre otros, así le permitirá ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes y mejorar sus ingresos, lo que le permitirá seguir luchando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su local propio”.
texts.en:
Mirian is a happy and polite young woman who lives in Nazca, a city known for a warm climate. The city is also the site of one of the most important pre-Incan cultures in the country, the Nazca culture, which left behind as their legacy one of the most popular tourist attractions in the country: the Nazca Lines. They are immense drawings in a huge desert; according to some studies, they served as an astronomic calendar for the Nazca culture. 

Miriam loves music and in her free time likes to relax while listening to it. She also likes to eat one of her favorite dishes, the delicious Arroz con Pollo (chicken and rice). Due to her parents' limited economic resources, she only finished high school, but she would have liked to study food engineering.

Every day Mirian gets up with much enthusiasm for her job selling women's clothing. She works about 9 hours a day and attends to about 15 customers a day. She thinks it's going well because she's friendly to her customers and always has a smile for them, so they are happy.

Mirian is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help she will be able to buy merchandise for her business, specifically blouses, pants, polo shirts for women and other things. This way she will be able to offer a greater variety of products to her customers and improve her income, which will let her continue working to make her biggest dream a reality: having her own store.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (blouses, pants, polo shirts and other things)

loans.name: Albina Adelaida

texts.es:
La señora Albina Adelaida se ha destacado por ser una persona trabajadora elaborando sus riquísimas tortillas inicia sus labores muy temprano para cocer  el maíz, lavarlo y posterior ir a moler el maíz  y luego iniciar a elaborar las tortillas en dos turnos de 10:00 am a 12:00 pm y de 4:00 pm a 6:00 pm. Además de vender sus riquísimas tortillas vende nacatamales todos los días viernes.

La señora Albina Adelaida utilizará el crédito de CEPRODEL para la compra al por mayor de los productos con los cuales elabora las  Tortillas donde obtiene mayor ganancia y así ha podido mejorar su poco a poco su vivienda. Entre los productos que comprará se encuentran Maíz, Leña, Cal.

La señora Albina actualmente está solicitando a CEPRODEL un financiamiento para realizar compras al por mayor y así poder obtener mayores ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Making her delicious tortillas, Albina Adelaida has distinguished herself for being a hardworking person.  She starts work very early to cook, wash, and grind the corn, and later to make the tortillas in two shifts, from 10:00 a.m. to 12:00 p.m., and from 4:00 p.m. to 6:00 p.m.  In addition to selling her delicious tortillas, she sells "nacatamales" [Nicaraguan tamales] every Friday.

Albina Adelaida will use the CEPRODEL loan to buy wholesale the products with which she makes the tortillas.  She gets greater profits and so has been able to improve her home little by little.  Among the products she will buy are corn, firewood, and lime.

Albina currently is requesting a loan from CEPRODEL to make purchases wholesale to be able to get greater income and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy firewood, corn, lime, leaves for Nicaraguan tamales, potatoes, etc.

loans.name: Vidal

texts.es: El Joven Vidal tiene 27 años años y es soltero no tiene hijos, se dedica al servicio de internet desde hace dos años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la zona San Juan de la ciudad de Santa Cruz, Este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, utilizara este préstamo para la compra de computadoras para su café internet ya que tiene mucha clientela y las que tiene no le abastece, por esta razón  solicita este préstamo es que hay mucha demanda de este servicio, Vidal  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son seguir creciendo y va a utilizar los beneficios brindar un mejor servicio a su clientela, Vidal es un joven con ganas de superación emprendedor, se siente agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Vidal is 27 years old. He is single and doesn’t have children. He has worked in internet service for two years. His business is located in the neighborhood of San Juan in the city of Santa Cruz. This loan is his first loan cycle in this institution. He will use this loan to buy computers for his internet café because he has a lot of customers and the computers he has aren’t enough. So, he is requesting this loan because there is much demand for this service. Vidal faces challenges in his business, which is to keep growing. He will use the loan to provide better service to his clients. Vidal is a young man with the desire to get ahead with his business. He is grateful to the institution for the support that is provided.

loans.use: to buy computers

loans.name: Rolando

texts.en:
Mr. Rolando is married. He is 28 years old and lives in the Philippines.
Mr. Rolando is a farmer and grows corn, cassava, sweet potatoes, and vegetables to earn a living. He has been doing this for 2 years. He has requested a loan to buy fertilizer for the farm. 
Mr. Rolando became a member of PMPC this year. In the future, Mr. Rolando hopes to improve his living conditions through his agriculture business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for the farm

loans.name: Glenis

texts.es: Glenis vive con su cónyuge y sus tres hijos en las edades de 17 a 20 años,  en el municipio de San Juan Nepomuceno. Ella desde el año 1995 inició el negocio de fabricar calzado artesanal en compañía de su cónyuge, al principio de manera empírica  elaboraba sandalias para sus hijas y algunas amigas, gradualmente a través de sus primeros compradores,  se dio  a conocer y se extendió entre sus vecinos, a quienes les gustaron los diseños. Glenis como manejaba su maquina de coser desde antes de iniciar con este negocio,  agregó este conocimiento, aprendiendo, la costura de suelas y forros, que son las operaciones en las que participa. Su meta es tener un local más amplio con maquinarias modernas,  que le faciliten el trabajo y fomentar el empleo, ayudando con ello a generar más ingresos,  para que sus hijos estudien y se conviertan en profesionales exitosos,  mejorando cada vez más su calidad de vida. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará materiales en mayor volumen y de contado, como plataformas de acrílico, láminas para las suelas, forros, gomas. Todo esto garantiza su éxito porque permite elaborar diseños de acuerdo con la temporada y tal como sus clientes lo solicitan, debido a que Glenis trabaja sobre pedidos.
texts.en:
Glenis lives with her husband and their three children, ages 17 to 20, in the town of San Juan Nepomuceno. In 1995 she and her partner began their business making artisan footwear. At the beginning she made sandals for her daughters and some friends, and through their first buyers she gradually became known among her neighbors who liked her designs. Glenis already knew how to sew before this business, and added this knowledge, learning about sewing soles and linings which are her part of the operation. Her goal is to have a bigger workshop with modern machines that will make the work easier and encourage employment, helping to generate more income so that her kids and study and become successful professionals and improve their quality of life. 

Currently she is applying for a Kiva loan, her first with the Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo, which she will use to buy materials in bulk and in cash - things like acrylic platforms, soles, linings, rubber. All of this will guarantee her success because it will let her make fashionable designs according to what her customers want, since Glenis works on request.

loans.use: to buy materials in bulk and in cash, like acrylic platforms, sheets for the soles, linings and rubber.

loans.name: Andres

texts.es:
Andrés es un hombre de 47 años de edad, casado y con 3 hijos dependientes. Tiene domicilio en el Caserío Sequiones, en la zona rural del distrito de Mórrope, con servicio de luz y agua. El lugar cuenta con una población de 100 familias.
Andrés se dedica a la crianza de animales pequeños, como cabras y cerdos, los cuales al alcanzar el peso y talla óptima, son llevados para comercializar en el mercado local. Este negocio lo heredó de sus padres, y está de más decir que lo conoce a la perfección. Además, cuenta con ingresos adicionales producto de labores en jornal.
El monto del crédito solicitado asciende a 3000 nuevos soles, los cuales serán utilizados para adquirir abonos para el mantenimiento de sus cultivos y para la compra de alimentos balanceados para sus animales.
texts.en:
Andrés is a 47-year-old gentleman who is married and has three dependent children. He has a home in the rural village of Sequiones in the District of Mórrope, where he receives electricity and running water. This place has a population of 100 families.

Andrés raises small animals, such as goats and pigs. When the animals reach the optimal weight and size, they are taken to the local market to be sold. Andrés inherited this business from his parents and many say he is an expert in this trade. In addition, he earns extra income as a day laborer. The amount of his requested loan is 3,000 PEN and the money will be used to acquire compost for maintaining his crops and to buy balanced feed for his animals.

loans.use: to buy feed for his livestock and compost for his crops.

loans.name: Fe

texts.en:
Ms. Fe is widowed with four children. She is 47 years old and lives in Catagan, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental. To earn a living, Ms. Fe has a copra [dried coconut meat used for oil production] buy and sell business. She has had this business for six years. Each month, she earns approximately 4,000 Philippine pesos. 

Ms. Fe has been a member of PMPC starting this year. In the future, Ms. Fe hopes to improve her living conditions using the profits from her business.

loans.use: to buy copra to sell.

loans.name: David Stalin

texts.es:
David Stalin, tiene 27 años de edad,  es soltero  vive en Montalvo  con sus padres.

La VRC  San Joaquín  se   encuentra a 15  minutos  de la oficina Montalvo, está conformada por 12 socios.

David   se dedica a la agricultura, al cultivo  de arroz, soya y maíz,   el dinero de este crédito lo destinara a la compra de todos los insumos, fertilizantes, urea, herbicidas que se necesitan para la siembra y así garantizar su cosecha. 

Las compras y ventas las realiza en la ciudad de Montalvo de manera trimestral.

Su sueño es comprarse un solar para construir su casa y un terreno para dedicarlo a la siembra.

Los desafíos a los que se enfrentan es a veces la pérdida de la cosecha por presencia de las lluvias y plagas..
Su tiempo libre lo dedica a  hacer deporte especialmente jugar vóley.
texts.en:
David Stalin is 27 years old, single, and lives with his parents in Montalvo.

The San Joaquín Communal Bank is located 15 minutes from the Cooperativa San Jose office in Montalvo. The group has 12 members.

David is a farmer who grows corn, soybeans, and rice. The money from this loan will be used to buy all of his supplies such as fertilizers, urea, and herbicides that are needed for his crops. This will help to guarantee his harvest. His purchases and sales are conducted in the city of Montalvo every three months.

David dreams of buying a plot of land for building a house and farmland designated for planting crops. The challenges he faces include the occasional crop loss as a result of diseases and an abundance of rain. In his free time, he enjoys playing sports -- especially volleyball.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, urea, and herbicides.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fish, shrimp, shellfish, and dried fish.

loans.name: Noel Eusebio

texts.es:
El señor Noel Eusebio, es originario del departamento de león donde ha vivido toda su vida, es soltero, en la actualizad solo dependen de él sus padres, su negocio es un cafetín comedor donde ofrece todo tiempo de comidas y bebidas. Inicia a elaborar su comida a las 10:00 am posterior inicia sus ventas finalizándolas a las 10:00 pm. Inicia su negocio gracias a un capital de C$ 1,000.00 productos de préstamos anteriores, anteriormente su negocio era la venta pan.

El señor Noel utilizará el crédito que le ha brindado CEPRODEL para la compra al por mayor de productos tales como: gaseosas, leña, pollo, arroz, aceite, etc… los cuales serán utilizados en la elaboración de comida y así poder obtener mayores ganancias.

El señor Noel Eusebio está sumamente agradecido con CEPRODEL por los créditos brindados hacia su persona los cuales han sido una bendición logrando mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar su capital de trabajo y mejorar la calidad de vida para él y sus padres.
texts.en:
Noel Eusebio is from the department of León, where he has lived his whole life.  He is single.  Currently his parents depend on him.

His business is a cafe restaurant where he serves all types of food and beverages.  He starts making his food at 10:00 a.m. and later begins his sales, finishing them at 10:00 p.m.  He started his business thanks to 1,000 córdobas (NIO) in capital, the product of previous loans.  Before that his business was selling bread.

Noel will use the loan from CEPRODEL to buy wholesale products such as soda, firewood, chicken, rice, oil, etc., which will be used to make food and so be able to get greater profits.

Noel Eusebio is extremely grateful to CEPRODEL for the loans he has received, which have been a blessing.  He managed to improve his income, increase his working capital, and improve the quality of life for him and his parents.

loans.use: to buy soda, firewood, chicken, rice, oil, etc.

loans.name: Ramiz

texts.en: Ramiz is from Gaza. He is 29 years old and lives with his wife and two children. Ramiz opened his mini market in 2010. He has the only store in the neighborhood.
