He is getting this loan to purchase a refrigerator and cash register. He hopes to diversify his inventory, offer more products for his customers, and increase his sales.

loans.use: to purchase a refrigerator and cash register

loans.name: German Jacinto

texts.es:
GERMAN JACINTO, tiene 57 años de edad,  es casado  vive en San Joaquín con su esposa y un hijo, procreó 6 hijos, los mismos que tienen 36, 34, 30, 28, 25 y 13 años de edad.

La VRC  San Joaquín  se   encuentra a 15  minutos  de la oficina Montalvo, está conformada por 12 socios.

GERMAN JACINTO se dedica a la agricultura, al cultivo  de arroz, cacao, soya,   el dinero de este crédito lo destinara a la compra de urea, fertilizantes, abonos orgánicos e insumos para la siembra, con la finalidad  de mejorar sus cultivos. 
Las compras y ventas las realiza en la ciudad de Montalvo de manera semanal.

Su sueño es mejorar sus cultivos y así tener mayor ganancia para garantizar los estudios de su ultima hija.
Los desafíos a los que se enfrentan  es  la presencia de plagas en los cultivos y la inclemencia de las lluvias.

Su tiempo libre lo dedica a leer y hacer deporte especialmente jugar vóley.
texts.en:
German Jacinto is 57 years old, married, and lives in San Joaquín with his wife and a child. He has six children and their ages are 36, 34, 30, 28, 25, and 13.

The San Joaquín Communal Bank is located 15 minutes from the Cooperativa San Jose office in Montalvo. The group has 12 members.

German Jacinto is a farmer who grows rice, cacao, and soybeans. The money from this loan will be used to buy urea, fertilizers, organic compost, and supplies for planting so that he will have better crops in the end. His purchases and sales are conducted in the city of Montalvo on a weekly basis.

German dreams of improving his crops so that he can earn more income to provide for the education of his youngest daughter. The challenges he faces include the presence of diseases that impact his crops and the harsh conditions as a result of too much rain. In his free time, German enjoys reading and playing sports -- especially volleyball.

loans.use: to buy urea, fertilizers, organic compost, and other farming supplies.

loans.name: Perchuhi

texts.en:
Perchuhi has been engaged in animal breeding for more than 20 years. She rears pigs, bees and cows. Also, Perchuhi has a garden where she grows plums to sell. Perchuhi uses the dairy products she produces for her family. She sells her meat to the butcher’s shop and she sells honey to her neighbors.

Perchuhi is 46 years old. She lives in Ijevan. Perchuhi is married and she has three children: two sons and a daughter. Her elder son and daughter are married. Her daughter lives away from her parents. Perchuhi’s elder son and his family live with Perchuhi and help her with the agricultural business. Her younger son is a pupil and Perchuhi’s husband works as a machine operator. 

Thanks to her agricultural business, Perchuhi was able to buy furniture for her house, pay for her children’s education and organize their weddings. 

Perchuhi is asking for a $1,500 loan to buy some calves which will allow her to produce dairy produce to sell and thus to gain more profit.

loans.use: to buy some calves

loans.name: Qasem

texts.en: Qasem is a 36-year-old married man. He lives with his wife and five children – three of them are in school. He is from Gaza. In October, 2011, Qasem opened a home products store. He is taking out this loan to install a glass door, shelves and a cash register. He hopes to improve the image of his store, carry more products, and attract more customers.

loans.use: to install a glass door, shelves and a cash register in his store

loans.name: Felicetas

texts.en:
Felicetas is married with six children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Felicetas is 50 years old and has one child who is in school. Felicetas has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 12 years. 

Felicetas requested a 10,000 Philippine pesos loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell in her food stall. Felicetas would like to save money to expand her business and secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Adriano

texts.es:
Adriano es un padre de familia de 60 años de edad quien tiene 2 hijos. Su domicilio se ubica en el sector de Bajo Cruceta, en la parte rural del distrito de Tambogrande, domicilio que sólo cuenta con servicio de electricidad.
La actividad que desarrolla el titular es la ganaderías (vacas y porcinas), teniendo actualmente 08 cabezas de vacuno, las cuales le producen leche fresca que luego entrega a la Municipalidad de Tambogrande. También cría porcinos, comercializándolos en el mercado local. Esta actividad la realiza hace más de 12 años y cuenta con experiencia en el manejo de su negocio. Su cónyuge lo apoya en todas sus actividades que realiza.
Es por ese motivo el que lo ha vuelto a recurrir a nuestra empresa para solicitar un préstamo equivalente a S/. 1000, el cual se destinaría a la adquisición de ganado vacuno y porcino y de alimentos para estos.
texts.en:
Adriano is 60 years old and the father of two children. His home is located in the rural sector of Bajo Cruceta, which is in the District of Tambogrande. The only service he receives in his home is electricity.

Adriano is a livestock breeder who raises cows and pigs. He currently has eight cows that produce fresh milk that he eventually sells in the town of Tambogrande. Adriano also raises pigs and sells them at the local market. He has been in business for more than 12 years and has acquired experience in managing this venture. His wife helps with all of his activities.

Adriano has returned to Edpyme Alternativa to request a loan in the amount of 1,000 PEN that will be used to acquire cows, pigs, and the appropriate feed.

loans.use: to buy cows, pigs, and animal feed.

loans.name: Edgar Anibal

texts.es:
Edgar Aníbal,   tiene 34 años de edad,  vive en unión libre en Montalvo con su esposa.

La VRC  San Joaquín  se   encuentra a 15  minutos  de la oficina Montalvo, está conformada por 12 socios.

Edgar Aníbal  se dedica a la agricultura, al cultivo  de arroz, el dinero de este crédito lo destinara a la compra de urea, abonos, insumos, hericidas para la siembra, con la finalidad  de mejorar sus cultivos. 

Las compras y ventas las realiza en la ciudad de Montalvo de manera semanal.

Su sueño es  comprar un terreno, los desafíos a los que se enfrentan  es  la presencia de plagas en los cultivos y la inclemencia de las lluvias.

Su tiempo libre lo dedica a leer y hacer deporte especialmente jugar vóley.
texts.en:
Edgar Aníbal is 34 years old and lives in Montalvo with his common-law wife.

The San Joaquín Communal Bank is located 15 minutes from the Cooperativa San Jose office in Montalvo. The group has 12 members.

Edgar Anibal is a farmer who grows rice. The money from this loan will be used to buy urea, compost, farming supplies, and herbicides for his crops. He hopes to improve his crops in the end. His purchases and sales are conducted in the city of Montalvo on a weekly basis.

Edgar dreams of buying a piece of land. The challenges he faces include the presence of crop diseases and the harsh conditions resulting from heavy rains. In his free time, Edgar enjoys reading and playing sports -- especially volleyball.

loans.use: to buy urea, compost, farming supplies, and herbicides.

loans.name: Rustam

texts.ru: Рустам женат, он трудолюбивый человек, который на воспитании имеет трех несовершеннолетних детей. Более 7 лет Рустам занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур. В основном он выращивает картошку. Также занимается скотоводством. Его жена и сын помогают в бизнесе. Он сам работает в семье и хочет содержать свою семью в достатке. Кроме того он занимается купле- продажей строительных материалов. Рустам запрашивает займ в размере 840$ США для покупки семян картошки и скота.
texts.en: Rustam is married, he is a hardworking man who has three underage children to raise. Rustam has been cultivating crops for more than seven years. He mainly grows potatoes. He also does animal husbandry. His wife and son help in the business. He is the only one that works in the family and wants to live and support his family in plenty. He also buys and sells raw building materials. Rustam is asking for a loan in the amount of $840 USD to buy potato seeds and cattle.

loans.use: to buy seeds and cattle.

loans.name: Julia Clotilde

texts.es:
Julia, tiene 35 años de edad, vive junto a su pareja, el cual es un hombre muy humilde y trabajador, ya que muy temprano se dedica a la venta de pan y luego se dedica a su labor como agricultor en una pequeña parcela; juntos tienen 3 hijos cuyas edades comprenden 14,7 y 10 meses, son lo mas importante que tienen en la vida y por ello trabaja mucho para darles lo mejor. Su vivienda se ubica en el distrito de Santiago, Ica, Perú. El Distrito de Santiago se caracteriza por albergar varias empresas agroexportadoras, las cuales brindan muchos empleos en la zona y sobre todo porque este distrito se caracteriza también por su actividad agrícola, en especial el cultivo de espárragos, uva y algodón; Julia es muy alegre, cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta ver televisión, en especial sus novelas; también le gusta preparar uno de sus platos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Escabache de pollo”. Ella solo estudio hasta el cuarto grado de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar secretariado, por ello se esfuerza mucho por darle lo mejor a sus hijos para que sean mejores que ella.

Cada día Julia se levanta muy temprano para abrir su negocio exactamente a las 4 de la mañana; ella vende Abarrotes, ella es muy dedicada y sobre todo porque se dio cuenta que abrir muy temprano su negocio y no cerrar en la hora del almuerzo le ayuda a vender un poco mas y poder tener más ingresos; trabaja alrededor de 12 horas diarias, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque atiende a los clientes de manera amable y sobre todo porque vende productos de calidad.

Julia está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayudad que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mas mercadería para su negocio, en especial arroz, azúcar, atún enlatado, entre otros; con esta mejora ella podrá tener mayor variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes y así mejorar sus ingresos, lo que le permitirá mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y seguir luchando día a día para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una profesión a sus hijos para que sean mejores que ella”.
texts.en:
Julia, 35, lives with her partner, who is a modest and hardworking man because very early he works selling bread and later at his job as a farmer on a little plot of land.  Together they have three children whose ages are 14 years, 7 years, and 10 months.  They are the most important thing they have in life, for which they work a lot to give them the best.

Her house is located in the district of Santiago, Ica, Peru.  Santiago is known for housing various agro-export businesses, which provide a lot of jobs in the area.  The district is also known for its agricultural activity, especially asparagus, grapes, and cotton.

Julia is very happy.  When she has some free time she likes to watch television, especially her soap operas.  She also likes to make one of her favorite dishes, which is "escabeche de pollo" [marinated chicken].  She only studied up to the fourth level of secondary school, but she would like to have studied to be a secretary.  This is why she works hard to be able to give her children the best, so they will be better than she is.

Every day Julia gets up very early to open her business at exactly 4 in the morning.  She sells groceries.  She is very dedicated and above all because she realized that opening her business very early and not closing during the lunch hour helps her to sell a bit more and be able to have more income.  She works around 12 hours a day.  She believes that it is going well for her because she attends to the customers in a friendly way and because she sells quality products.

Julia is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they have given her she will be able to buy more merchandise for her business, particularly rice, sugar, and canned tuna, among other things.  With this improvement she will be able to have a greater variety of products to sell to her customers and so improve her income.  This will allow her to improve her family's quality of life and continue fighting every day to realize her big dream: "To give her children a profession so they will be better than she is."

loans.use: to buy merchandise (rice, sugar, and canned tuna, among other things).

loans.name: Jahirina

texts.es: Jahirina de 22 años de edad es propietaria de un restaurante que compró su madre,  quien trabajó durante 3 años en ese negocio y lo compró a su dueño. Consientes de esta gran responsabilidad   Jahirina y su madre trabajan persistentemente para sacarlo adelante, pero su mayor desafío es no tener el capital de trabajo suficiente para lograr aumentar sus ventas. En la actualidad está aplicando  a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará materias primas, como arroz, aceite, azucar, sal, legumbres etc pues desean aumentar sus ventas y comprar en mayor cantidad y de contado, para ganar descuentos, lo que garantizaría el éxito de esta inversión. Su meta mas adelante  es terminar de pagar el restaurante y más adelante comprar un local, para hacer adecuaciones requeridas y generar un ambiente confortable entre sus clientes
texts.en: Jahirina is 22 years old, she is the owner of a restaurant that was bought by her mother who worked for 3 years in the business and bought it from the owner. Realizing it was a great opportunity, Jahirina and her mother work constantly to make it succeed but her greatest obstacle is not having enough work capital to increase her sales. At present she needs a loan from credikiva, her first through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo; she will buy raw materials like: rice, oil, sugar, salt, vegetables, etc. since they wish to increase their sales and to buy more items cash down to get discounts that will guarantee the success of her investment. Jahirina’s goal is to finish paying off the restaurant and later on buy a stall to make the necessary changes and have a comfortable environment for her customers.

loans.use: buy raw materials like: rice, oil, sugar, salt, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Fabiola Ester

texts.es:
Fabiola es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y siempre estar en busca de ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Fabiola es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 5 hijos, pues su esposo murió hace un tiempo y ella quedó viuda a cargo de sus hijos. Desde hace aproximadamente 21 años, montó junto con su esposo una tienda general con el ánimo de generar los ingresos necesarios para su hogar, y gracias al conocimiento que tuvo durante este tiempo de parte de su esposo sobre cómo atender su tienda, pudo sacarla adelante luego de la muerte de su esposo. Fabiola presta un muy buen servicio y gracias a esto ha podido captar muy buenos clientes que le garantizan muy buenas ventas. Con el ánimo de realizar algunas mejoras locativas a su negocio, Fabiola busca un préstamo que le permita acceder a realizar algunas reformas locativas a su negocio para hacerlo más agradable para sus clientes.
Fabiola estima que de esta manera podrá seguir sacando su negocio adelante y conservando su negocio en un buen estado. Además, espera que con esto sus ventas aumenten y sus hijos puedan gozar de una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Fabiola is someone who has always been very hard-working and is always seeking to offer her family a better quality of life. She is a single mother and the head of her family of 5 sons. Her husband died some time ago and she was left to take care of her sons as a widow. 

Roughly 21 years ago, she set up a general store with her husband with the purpose of generating the income necessary for her household. Thanks to the knowledge gained from her husband during that time about how to manage the shop, she was able to keep the business going once he passed. Fabiola provides very good service and thanks to this she has been able to gain very good customers that guarantee good sales. 

With the goal of making some alterations to her shop, she is requesting a loan that would enable her to make some of those alterations to her business in order to make it more pleasant for her customers. Fabiola considers that in this way she will be able to continue to move forward with her shop as well as keep it in good repair. Moreover, she hopes that it will help her sales to grow and her sons can enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to make some alterations to her shop in order to make it more pleasant for her customers.

loans.name: Pengayom Indah Group

texts.en:
Now Nurhayati not only sells "Gamis", but she receives orders from her customers. That is why she needs to take a new loan from VisionFund Indonesia to buy clothes ordered by her customers.  Since having the loan from VisionFund Indonesia, she and her family keep improving the food and nutrition they give to their children because she has more income, not just the income from her husband.
Before, this group using the leader's name, now they use Pengayom Indah as a group name.

loans.use: to pay for more clothes to sell

loans.name: Sos

texts.en:
Sos, 72, is a single parent who has been living in the Prey Chor district of Kompong Cham province. She is a good homemaker and a responsible mother of five children.  One her her children is single and the other four are married and earn an income by planting crops. 

Sos is requesting additional capital of $800 to purchase a motorbike so she and her family can ride to anywhere without hiring a motor taxi when they need to go out.  This will reduce the cost of traveling for her family.

loans.use: buy a motorbike

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
Margarita, de 36 años, vive en su propia casa junto  a su pareja Teodoro de 31  años, quien le apoya con los gastos de sus  03 adorados hijos. Margarita, es una mujer muy firme y se dedica con mucho empeño al cultivo de café y cacao  junto a su esposo; ambos saben el deber de  luchar por tener la mejor producción puesto que sus vecinos de su localidad también producen café. Margarita, lleva 22 años realizando esta actividad y comenta que para ella es muy dificultoso tener que combatir con las plagas que abaten sus plantaciones. Es por ello que acude a las oficinas de MFP para que le ayuden con los planes de trabajo que se propone a realizar para no dañen sus siembras. Margarita, espera el apoyo de los financistas para que pueda lograr con sus planes de trabajo y con el tiempo llegar a obtener la mejor cosecha de toda su localidad. Este será su crédito número 04 con MFP; por el cual asegura cumplir fielmente con sus compromisos de pago, además esta conforme por la responsabilidad y puntualidad que ejercen cada de uno de sus socios, de su banco comunal.
Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, servirá para darle abono a sus plantaciones, con la finalidad de prevenir cualquier evento que pueda implicar en sus plantas agrícolas, para ello comprará fertilizantes.
texts.en:
Margarita, 36 years old, lives in her own house with her partner Teodoro, 31 years old. He helps her with the expenses of their 3 adored children.  Margarita is a very strong woman and works with a lot of dedication in farming coffee and cacao with her husband. They both know the obligation to struggle to have the best production, given that their neighbors in their town also produce coffee. Margarita has spent 22 years at this business and comments that for her it is very difficult to have to fight with the pests that bring down her crops. It is because of this that she comes to the MFP offices, so that they will help her with work plans that she proposes to carry out so as not to damage their crops. 

Margarita hopes for the support of the financiers so she can succeed with her work plans and, in time, be able to obtain the best harvest of her whole town. This will be her 4th loan with MFP, which assures she will faithfully fulfill her payment commitments. Furthermore, she is satisfied with the responsibility and punctuality that each of the members of her communal bank practice.  

The 2,000 nuevos soles will be used to apply fertilizer to her crops, with the result of preventing whatever event that may harm her agricultural plants. For this purpose, she will buy fertilizers.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Marleni

texts.es:
Marleni tiene 28 años, vive en su casa propia en compañía de su esposo Eduardo y de su pequeño hijo Luis. Ellos viven en el caserío de Cumutay, distrito de Huasahuasi. Marleni creció rodeada de campos verdes y gente trabajadora, así aprendió las técnicas del cultivo ayudando en la labor a sus padres, luego cuando formo su propia familia empezó a trabajar junto a su esposo. Dice que este trabajo es muy cansado y absorbente, pues siembra papa y arveja en sus propios terrenos, y debe vigilar sus cultivos todos los días, desde muy temprano, para cuidarlos de las plagas y las inclemencias del tiempo que muchas veces afectan y atacan sus cultivos. Por su parte, Eduardo ya lleva un año trabajando como peón en una empresa constructora, que le brinda ingresos mensuales fijos. Una de las cosas que más le incomoda es trasladar la pesada carga de sus cosechas, para eso contrata personal operario y camiones. Y como es una mujer emprendedora para más adelante tiene planeado aumentar su producción. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Lindo amanecer de cumutay” y este es sería su crédito número 10 que recibiría de MFP, promete ser puntual y responsable en el pago de sus cuotas, además esta muy agradecida con todas las personas que hicieron posible el crédito.
Marleni de recibir su apoyo, comprará una bolsa de semillas de arvejas para iniciar una siembra que piensa cosechar en julio.
texts.en:
Marleni is 28 years old and lives in her own house with her husband Eduardo and their small child Luis. They live in the village of Cumutay, district of Huasahuasi.  

Marleni grew up around green fields and hard working people, and so she learned the techniques of growing crops helping her parents in their work.  Later when she had her own family, she began to work with her husband.  She says that this work is tiring and consuming. They sow potatoes and peas on their own land, and must keep tend their corps everyday from very early in order to keep them from the pests and the inclement weather that often can affect and attack their crops.  

For his part, Eduardo has been working for a year as a laborer for a construction company and brings in a fixed monthly income.  One of the things that is most uncomfortable for her is moving the heavy load of her harvests, for this she contracts with operators and trucks.  As she is a hardworking woman, in the future she has planned to increase her production.  

She belongs to the communal bank “Lindo amanecer de cumutay” and this will be the tenth loan that she would receive from MFP.  She promises to be punctual and responsible in her payments.  In addition, she is very grateful to the people that make the loan possible.  Upon receiving the support, Marleni will buy a bag of pea seeds to sow for the July harvest

loans.use: to purchase pea seeds.

loans.name: Cristina Bartola

texts.es: Cristina es una mujer de 69 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar en su pasteleria y venta de calzado. su historia empezó cuando siempre vendía zapatos y le gusta la repostería aprendió de su mama, su trabajo lo hace sola, no tiene dificultades, no está casada, tiene hijos, su sueño más importante es tener local propio de pastelería. Por eso quiere el préstamo para la comprar de calzado, harina,huevos, levadura, leche para hacer postres para la venta en su negocio de pasteleria.
texts.en: Cristina is a 69 year old woman who has many hopes for progress in her bakery and shoe store in the next few years.  Her story started when she always sold shoes and liked pastry making that she learned from her mother.  She works alone and has no difficulties.  She's unmarried and has children.  Her greatest dream is to have her own pastry shop which is why she wants the loan to buy shoes and flour, eggs, yeast, and milk to make pastries.

loans.use: to purchase shoes, and flour, eggs, yeast, and milk to make her deserts

loans.name: Federico

texts.es:
Federico, de 47 años es un hombre trabajador. Vive en compañía de su esposa Silvia, con quien tiene una hermosa hija: Estela, de 6 años de edad, a quien cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Aymará. Todas las mañanas junto a su esposa se dirigen a sus campos de cultivos, donde ella cuida de sus animales entre ovejas, cuenta con 80 ejemplares, además de cerdos, vacas y caballos. Que cuida con mucho esmero, pues su negocio está en engordarlos y venderlos a mayor precio entre los carniceros que visitan la zona. Ahora él se siente algo preocupado, ya que hace días que llegaron los zorros que están comiendo a sus animales, pero ya está planeando la manera de contrarrestar ese problema. Ahora su preocupación se centra en cuidar a sus cultivos de alverja, papa y habas, en donde invirtió la mayoría de su capital, cuenta que muy pronto conseguirá mejorar sus sembríos de verduras, pues tiene un Fito toldo, donde sembró diversas variedades de ellas, asimismo su otro proyecto es mejorar la raza de sus ovejas comprado un macho de raza para que fecunde a las hembras. Él pertenece al grupo solidario “flor de papa” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde se siente desarrollado, ya que obtiene la ayuda para progresar en su negocio. Por ello promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le gusta trabajar en su asociación pues son personas responsables y solidarias.
Federico de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varias cabezas de ganado ovino, para aumentar sus ganados.
texts.en:
Federico is 47 years old and is a hard working man. He lives in the company of his wife Silvia, with whom he has a beautiful daughter, Estela. Estela is 6 years old and Federico takes care of her in their own home, located in Aymara. 

Every morning Federico and his wife go to their crop fields, where she takes care of their animals including sheep, they own 80 of them, also pigs, cows and horses. Silvia takes good care of them because their business consists of fattening the livestock and selling them for a higher price to the butchers that visit the area. Federico is somewhat worried since a few days ago foxes arrived and they have been eating his animals, but he is already planning on how to counteract the problem. Now his worries focus on taking care of his crops of peas, potatoes and broad beans, where he invested most of his capital. Federico shares that he soon will be able to improve the quality of his vegetable crops, since he has a garden tent, where he planted many different varieties of them. Also another project of his is to better the breed of his sheep by purchasing a pure bred male to impregnate the females. 

Federico belongs to the solidarity group Flor de Papa [Potato Flower] and this is the first loan with MFP where he feels realized since he receives the support to improve his business. Because of this he promises to be punctual with the payment of his dues. He also enjoys working with his group because they are responsible and helpful people. 

Upon receiving your support, Federico will invest the loan amount solicited in the purchase of several sheep to increase his livestock.

loans.use: to buy sheep.

loans.name: And Joubo Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe and joubo a été créé le 20/12/2009.IL est composé de 27 membres issus de la meme zone. Elles ont pour activité principale le commerce.

Madame lawratou (debout à droite de la photo et levant la main) est responsable du groupe, âgée de 47 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 05 enfants en charge.

Son activité consiste la vente de tissus, elle dispose d'une bonne expérience pour ce type d'activité pour l'avoir exercée depuis plusieurs années.

Son prêt lui permettra  de s'approvisionner en quantité importante en tissus et faire face à la demande de ses clients.

Son objectif est de participer aux charges de la maison en assurant une partie de la dépense quotidienne et les frais scolaires de ses enfants.
texts.en:
The group And Joubo was created on 20/12/2009. It consists of 27 members from the same zone. Their primary business is trade.

Madam Lawratou (standing on the right in the photo and raising her hand) is 47 years old and responsible for the group. She is married and mother to 5 children who are her dependents.

Her business consists in selling fabric. She has good experience for this type of business from having practiced it for several years.

Her loan will allow her to stock up in a large quantity of fabric and meet the demands of her clients.

Her goal is to participate in the responsibilities of her home by taking care of part of the daily expenses and the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Maria Susana

texts.es: María es una mujer de 50 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de mejorar su restaurante y comida rápida. Su historia empezó cuando la mama empezó el negocio de comidas, su trabajo lo hace con la mama todos los días, tiene dificultades son la enfermedades, no está casada, no tiene hijos, su sueño más importante es tener un local grande y horno eléctrico, cocina industrial para producir mas comida. Por eso quiere el préstamo para su restaurante y poder comprar carnes, frutas, horno electrico.
texts.en:
María is a 50 year old woman who has great aspirations for her restaurant and fast food business to prosper in the coming years.  Her story started when her mother started the business.  She does her work with her mother every day.

She does have difficulties, which are illnesses.  She is not married, and she does not have children.

Her most important dream is to have an establishment, an electric oven, and an industrial stove.

Therefore, she wants the loan for her restaurant and to be able to purchase meat, fruit, and an electric oven.

loans.use: to purchase meats, fruits, and an electric oven

loans.name: Noel Antonio

texts.es: El señor Noel vive en la Ciudad de Choluteca, junto con sus 2 hijos y su esposa , el es una persona muy trabajadora, dedicado a su taller de estructuras metálicas,  como portones, ventanas, puertas entre otros, esta actividad la realiza desde hace 13 años, por la calidad y el acabado de su trabajo ya cuenta con muchos clientes y otros que lo recomiendan, Sus vecinos lo consideran muy honrado y responsable cada día que pasa trabaja muy fuerte para hacer crecer su negocio y poder ofrecer mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.  Esta solicitando crédito por valor de L. 15,000.00 para la compra de hierro, electrodos, varillas, llavines y otros.
texts.en: Noel lives in the city of Choluteca along with his two children and wife. He is a very hardworking person, working in his workshop of steel structures like gates, windows, doors, etc. He’s been doing this work for 13 years. Owing to the quality and the result of his work he already has many clients and others that they recommend him to. His neighbors consider him to be very trustworthy and responsible. He spends every day working very hard in order to grow his business and be able to provide his family better living conditions. He is asking for a loan of L. 15,000 to buy iron, electrodes, rods, keys, etc.

loans.use: to buy iron, electrodes, rods, keys, etc. for his business.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan de 69 años está casado con Dina de 64 años. Ambos tienen 4 hijos: Elizabeth de 38, Nelva de 23, Gilder de 21 y Amer de 07. Juan y Dina solo viven con dos de sus hijos en una casa propia en la comunidad campesina de Pian, distrito de Tarma. Desde niño Juan se dedicó a la agricultura, gracias a sus años de experiencia se siente seguro que todos sus negocios han sido positivos. Actualmente siembra papa, pero en pocas cantidades, también siembra zanahorias y flores como gladiolos y “Saritas” (flores blancas pequeñas). 
“Prefiero sembrar flores por que el trabajo no es muy cansado, mis fuerzas no son las mismas”, comenta, pero afirma que con la venta de sus flores puede estar seguro de solventar sus gastos diarios.
Sus hijos mayores lo ayudan en el campo, principalmente en el cultivo de la papa. 
La inversión que realiza es considerable, pues compra semillas, abonos y en contratar peones, pero todo esto se ve recompensado con el resultado de las ventas. 
De esa manera pudo sacar adelante a sus hijos mayores y espera hacerlo con los más pequeños.  Ya que a su avanzada edad solo quiere ver a sus hijos realizarse como personas de bien. Éste sería su crédito número 11 que obtendría de MFP, por eso da su palabra de ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas mensuales. Está contento de ser parte de un banco comunal íntegro y responsable como lo es “Sarita Colonia”.
De recibir el dinero podrá completar lo que necesita para adquirir 2 bolsas de semillas de flores y 3 sacos de fertilizantes orgánicos. Es decir invertirá 1000 soles.
texts.en:
Juan is 69 years old, and he is married with Dina, 64. They have 4 children: Elizabeth, 38, Nelva, 23, Gilder, 21 and Amer, 7. Only Gilder and Amer live with Juan and Dina in a house they own in Pian, a rural community in the Tarma district. Since he was a child, Juan has been engaging in agriculture, and thanks to his long experience he is confident that all of his activities have had a positive result. He is currently planting potatoes, albeit in small quantities because this is a tiring activity; he also plants carrots and flowers such as gladioli and “Saritas” (small white flowers).
“I prefer planting flowers because the job is not very tiring, I am not as strong as I used to be”, he says; but he also states that by selling flowers he can be sure to gain the money he needs to pay for his daily expenses.
His first two children help him in the fields, particularly with the potatoes crop.
He invests a remarkable sum of money: in seeds, in manure and to pay for laborers, but it is all compensated by the selling returns.
He has been able to provide for his first two children through this activity, and he hopes to do the same with the younger ones, as at his age the only thing he wants is to see his children become good citizens. This will be his 11th loan from MFP, and for this reason he gives his word he will be punctual in the repayments of his monthly dues. He is happy to be a member of “Sarita Colonia”, an upright and responsible Communal Bank.
Once he will receive the loan he will be able to finish buying what he needs by purchasing 2 bags of flower seeds and 3 bags of manure, that is to say he will invest 1000 PEN.

loans.use: To buy 2 bags of flower seeds and 3 bags of manure.

loans.name: Monica

texts.es:
Mónica de 40 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de su esposo e hijos a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad del Tambo. El trabajo incesante que realiza todos los días, está dando sus frutos. Mónica es una mujer de mucha energía, el trabajo y el bienestar de su familia es lo que más valora. Por ello que tomo la decisión firme de ser una mujer  que genera ingresos para su familia mediante la fábrica de ladrillos, ya tiene 4 años de haber tomado esta feliz  decisión, con el paso de los años ha visto crecer significativamente su negocio. Todo gracias al apoyo que recibe de sus hijos y esposo quienes trabajan juntos para sacar los millares de ladrillos que realizan al mes. Ahora desea mejorar sus ingresos y producir más cantidad de ladrillos para abastecer a los clientes. Este es el octavo crédito con MFP, donde se siente desarrollada, ya que obtiene la ayuda para progresar en su negocio. Por ello promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le gusta trabajar en su asociación pues son personas responsables y solidarias.
Mónica de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de insumos para la preparación de los ladrillos.
texts.en:
At 40 years old, Monica is a hard working woman.  She lives in the company of her husband and children and cares for them in her own house, located in the town of Tambo.  The incessant work that she carries out every day is bearing its fruits.  

Monica is a woman with great energy. Work and the well-being of her family is what she values most.  For this reason she made the firm decision to be a woman who generates income for her family through the brick factory. It's already been four years since she made this happy decision, and with the passing of time she has seen her business grow significantly.  All of this is thanks to the support she receives from her children and husband who work together to produce the thousands of bricks made each month.  

Now she wants to improve her income and produce a larger quantity of bricks in order to supply her customers.  This is her eighth loan with MFP, where she feels empowered as she gets help to progress in her business.  For this reason she promises to make her payments on time.  Furthermore, she likes to work with her association because they are responsible and work together in solidarity.  

Upon receiving the support, Monica will invest the money requested in purchasing supplies to make the bricks.

loans.use: to buy materials to make bricks.

loans.name: Nolita

texts.en:
Nolita is 43 years old and has three school-age children. Despite being a widow, she has the determination to uplift her family's living conditions and educate her children. To earn a living, she sells different types of clothes. She has been in this business for almost eight years and earns a net profit of PHP 9,000 that she usually spends on food and allowances for her children. 

She aimed to improve her business to increase her income, but due to insufficient capital, she is asking for an additional PHP 10,000 to purchase additional kinds of clothes and accessories to sell. She believes the loan will enable her to make an improvement in her business and is hoping that she will become successful someday.

loans.use: to purchase additional kinds of clothes and accessories to sell

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 23-year-old single man. He is a truck driver who makes a low salary which is not enough to cover his daily costs. For the past two years, Ahmad has been purchasing a small piece of land for agriculture, which has been a profitable project. Ahmad is requesting a $1,000 US youth loan from FATEN to help him complete the purchase of the additional piece of land in order to expand the cultivated area. This will increase sales and improve Ahmad's income.
Ahmad is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: to complete paying the price of purchasing a piece of land

loans.name: Hamzeh

texts.en:
Hamzeh is a 22-year-old man. He is married but has no children yet.

He has a tractor and wants to purchase a carriage to use for transporting and selling bricks for construction, in order to improve his work.

Hamzeh is requesting a 1,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing the carriage. This will create for Hamzeh better work conditions and increase sales and improve the family's income.

Hamzeh is photographed next to the tractor he owns.

loans.use: To purchase a tractor carriage.

loans.name: Book Diom 2 Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de solidarité a été créé le 20/12/2009.IL est composé de 04 membres qui sont issus de la meme localité.Elles ont pour activité principale le commerce.

Madame Seyni (à l’extrême droite sur la photo) est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 34 ans. Elle est divorcée et mère d'une fille.

Son activité principale est le commerce de tissus teintés,en plus de cela elle vend des noix de cola et des produits cosmétiques.

Son prêt va lui permettre de s'approvisionner en marchandises (tissus, noix de colas et produits cosmétiques) pour mieux développer son activité commerciale et satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle.

Son objectif est d'assurer les frais scolaires de sa fille; les frais médicaux et leur nourriture.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was create on 20 December 2009. The group is composed of 4 women from the same area, who are all involved in retail businesses.
Ms. Seyni (at the far right in the photo) is responsible for the group. She is 34 years old, divorced, and has one daughter. She main retail activity is selling dyed cloths, but she also sells cola nuts and cosmetic products. She is asking for a loan in order to stock up on goods (cloth, nuts and cosmetics) in order to better develop her business. Her aim is to cover schooling feeds, medical costs and food for her daughter.

loans.use: purchase dyed cloth, cola nuts and cosmetic products

loans.name: Arafatt Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de solidarité a été créé le 20/12/2009.IL est composé de 8 femmes qui habitent toutes dans la meme localité et ont des liens de parenté. Elles ont comme activité principale le commerce.

Madame TRIANKE (à l’extrême droite et levant le bras sur la photo) est la responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 32 ans et a 03 enfants en charge.

Son prêt va lui  permettre de s'approvisionner en plusieurs produits: tissus teintés,beurre de karité et des fruits. Elle dispose d'une bonne expérience pour ce type d'activité pour l'avoir exercé plusieurs années.

Son objectif est de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille en assurant une partie de la nourriture,les frais scolaires de ses enfants et les soins médicaux.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was established on 20 December 2009. Comprised of 8 women who live in the same area and are part of an extended family. They all work in the retail industry.

Ms. TRIANKE (seen at the far right in the photo with her arm raised) is responsible for the group. She is 32 years old and has 3 children under her care. This loan will allow her to stock up on a variety of products: died cloth, shea butter and fruits. She has experience in this type of retail activity and has been involved in this for several years. 

Her goal is to take care of the needs of her family by take care of food purchases, schooling fees for her children and medical costs.

loans.use: purchase dyed cloths, she butter and fruits

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud, age 22, has been operating a restaurant for the past year. He is recently married, and he and his wife have no children yet. The business has been a profitable project, but does not yet bring in enough money to cover the family's expenses and cover the costs of work.

Mahmoud is requesting a youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing a new refrigerator, which he will use for preserving food at his restaurant. This will allow him to expand the scope of his work, improve his business, and increase the family's income.
Mahmoud is photographed in his restaurant.

loans.use: to purchase a new refrigerator to use for preserving food at his restaurant

loans.name: Abdulrahman

texts.en:
Abdulrahman is a 26-year-old single young man. He is a blacksmith who earns a low income, which is not enough to cover his daily costs and medical expenses.

Abdulrahman is requesting a youth loan from FATEN to help him pay urgent medical expenses because he is suffering from back pain. This will improve Abdulrahman's health to better enable him to live normally. Abdulrahman is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: to pay medical expenses needed to cure himself.

loans.name: Damascene

texts.en:
Damascene is 35 years old and is married with five children aged between 2 and 14 years old. He sells second-hand clothing such as: pants and shirt for men. This is his 12th year in this business and he starts to work from 6 am to 6 pm per day. 

Damascene has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more second-hand clothing such as: pants and shirt for men to sell. With any profits, he will be able to save for his future and to reinvest in his business.

loans.use: To purchase more second-hand clothing such as: pants and shirt for men to sell.

loans.name: Ziyad

texts.en:
Zeyad is a 21-year-old single man. He is a university student. His father is a construction worker who earns a modest salary, in addition to working in agriculture.
 
Zeyad works in agriculture with the rest of the family members, and he wants to contribute to the purchase of a greenhouse. He is requesting a 1,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to provide a share of the family's costs of purchasing the greenhouse. It will allow them to produce a better crop and thus increase their sales and improve the family's income.

Zeyad is photographed next to the greenhouse.

loans.use: to purchase a greenhouse.

loans.name: And Jeff Group

texts.fr:
le groupe And Jeff a été crée depuis l'inauguration du Banc Villageois et il est composé actuellement  9 femmes habitant du même village et partageant des valeurs sociales communes.

Madame Woré (debout à gauche de la photo, levant la main et portant un récipient jaune) est responsable de ce groupe. Elle est âgée de 55 ans . Elle est marié et mère de quatre(04) enfants et deux petits fils  à sa charge. 

Woré fait du commerce de bétail (mouton) depuis longtemps , elle dispose d'une bonne expérience en ce domaine.

Son nouveau crédit de 50000 francs CFA  elle va acheter deux  mouton qu'elle va élever et revendre au 

niveau du marché hebdomadaire de sa localité. 

Ses bénéfices lui permettront de satisfaire ses besoins personnels et de participer aux dépenses quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en:
The And Jeff Group has been in existence since the launch of Banc Villageois and is currently made up of nine women who live in the same village and share common social values.

Mrs. Woré (standing at left in the photo, raising her hand and carrying a yellow container) is the leader of this group. She is 55 years old. She is married and the mother of four children and two grandchildren in her care. 

Woré has been in the livestock business for a long time; she has considerable experience in this field.

With her new loan of 50,000 CFA francs, she is going to purchase two sheep, which she will raise and sell at the local weekly market.

Her profits will allow her to meet her personal needs and to contribute to the daily expenses of the family.

loans.use: To purchase livestock.

loans.name: Ibrahem

texts.en:
Ibrahem is a 22-year-old single young man. He works in maintenance of mobile phones and for the past five years, Ibrahem has also been selling fruits and vegetables in a place characterized by continuous movement of customers (foot traffic), which has been a profitable project.

Ibrahem is requesting a 3,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing in bulk fruits and vegetables that customers request daily. This will increase sales and improve Ibrahem's income.

loans.use: To purchase in bulk fruits and vegetables for sale

loans.name: Sope Serigne Fallou Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Sope Serigne fallou a été crée depuis le premier cycle du Banc Villageois. Il est composé actuellement de 8 femmes qui habitent toutes dans le même village et ayant des valeurs sociales communes.

Madame Fatou (debout à gauche de la photo est levant la main) est responsable de ce groupe. Elle  est âgée de 52 ans. Elle mariée et mère de 7 enfants et 2 petits fils.

Elle est membre du banc villageois depuis son inauguration.

Fatou s'active dans le petit commerce par la vente de de tissus. Elle dispose d'une bonne expérience dans ce secteur pour l'avoir pratiquée depuis longtemps.

Son nouveau crédit lui permettra d'acheter des tissus wax ,thioub basin et Khartoum qu'elle va revendre à ses camarades membres de Banc Villageois.

Les bénéfices de son activité lui permettront de prendre en charge les dépenses de sa famille ( achat riz 

huile sucre et lait)d'une part et d'autre part d'acheter des fourniture scolaires pour ses enfants.
texts.en:
The Sope Serigne Fallou group has been in existence since the first cycle of the Banc Villageois.  It currently consists of 8 women who live in the same village and share common social values.
Fatou (standing on the left in the photo and raising her hand) is the representative of the group.  She is 52 years old and married.  She has 7 children and 2 grandsons.
She has been a member of the Banc Villageois since its inception.
Fatou is actively involved in the retail sale of fabrics.  She has been working in this field for a long time and has a good experience of this activity.
Her new loan will allow her to purchase wax print fabrics (indigo dyed fabrics and Khartoum cloth), which she will resell to fellow members of the Banc Villageois.
With the profits, she will take care of her family expenses (pay for the purchase of rice, oil, sugar and milk), and also buy school supplies for her children.

loans.use: to buy fabrics.

loans.name: Balla Camara Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 12 juin 2008. Il  est  constitué de 09 femmes qui habitent le même village. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.
Madame Josephine qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 27 ans. Elle est célibataire et mère de 03 enfants. Elle s’active dans la restauration, avec une buvette. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, qu’elle pratique depuis plusieurs années.
Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités.
Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, habillement etc.…) et d’augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en: The community group was created on 12th June 2008. It comprises 9 women who live in the same village. Their main activity is small retail trading. Josephine, who is on the right of the photo with her hand raised, is the group leader. She is 27 years old, single and the mother of 3 children. She runs a restaurant with a small bar. She has good experience in this activity, having worked in it for several years. This loan will allow her to increase her working capital and to better develop her business. The profits will allow her to improve the family's living conditions (health, food, clothing, etc) and to increase her savings.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for her bar-restaurant

loans.name: Sope Serigne Fallou Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe a été créé le 10 Février 2012. IL est composé de 13 femmes issues de différents quartiers. Elles se sont constituées par affinité, par voisinage. La plus part d'entre elles sont des parents elles ont comme activité le petit commerce. 

Faty est responsable du groupe, elle est debout à droite sur la photo. Elle est âgée de 41 ans et à en charge une petite fille. 

Elle a pour activité principale le petit commerce d'habits, de tissus et produits cosmétiques. Elle dispose d'une petite cantine devant chez elle où elle développe son activité qu'elle mène depuis plusieurs années. 

Son prêt lui permettra de s'approvisionner en marchandises pour satisfaire sa clientèle. 

Son objectif est de pouvoir subvenir aux besoins de sa famille sur le plan scolaire, sanitaire et de renforcer son épargne.
texts.en: The group was formed on the 10th February 2012. It comprises 13 women from different areas. They came together through friendship and proximity. Most of them are parents, and are small retail traders. Faty is the group leader, she is standing on the right in the photo. She is 41 years old and is responsible for a small girl. Her main activity is the trading of outfits, fabrics and cosmetic products. She has a small stall in front of her home where she conducts her business, as she has been doing for several years. This loan will allow her to buy more stock to meet her customers' wants. Her goal is to be able to meet the family's financial needs in schooling and healthcare, and to increase her savings.

loans.use: to purchase cloth, outfits and cosmetic products

loans.name: Koute Diomboulou Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 12 juin 2008. Il  est  constitué de 15 femmes qui habitent le même village. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.

Madame Yacine qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 50 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 06 enfants. Elle a aussi en sa charge 03 autres enfants confié par ses parents.

Elle s’active dans la vente de légumes. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, qu’elle pratique depuis plusieurs années.

Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités.

Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, habillement etc.…) et d’augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was created on June 12, 2008.  It consists of 15 women who live in the same village.  Their main activity is small retail business.
Yacine is the representative of the group.  She is standing at the far right in the photo and raising her hand.  She is 50 years old, married, and the mother of 6 children.  She has 3 other children in her care, entrusted to her by her parents.
She is actively involved in the sale of vegetables.  She has been practicing this activity for several years and has a good experience in this field.
This loan will allow her to strengthen her capital and to better develop her activities.
The profits generated from her business will allow her to increase her savings and to provide better living conditions for her family (health, food, clothes etc...)

loans.use: to buy vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Maty

texts.fr:
Maty  est une femme mariée âgée de 41 ans et mère de 3 enfants .

Madame Maty est membre du BV depuis le 20/12/2006 et elle appartient depuis lors au groupe de solidarité 

beug Diam .

Elle s'active dans l'embauche ovine et caprine et dans le petit commerce.

Madame Maty dispose d'une bonne expérience pour avoir pratiqué ces activités depuis longtemps.

Avec son nouveau crédit de 355.000 XOF elle va acheter des moutons et des chèvres qu'elle va élever et revendre plutard.

Les bénéfices réalisés par son activité lui permettront d'épargner et de soutenir son mari dans la gestion des dépenses familiales.
texts.en:
Maty is a married woman who is 41 years old and mother to three children. She has been a member of the Banc Villageois since 20th December 2006 and has belonged to the Beug Diam solidarity group since then. She fattens oxen and has a small trading activity. She has good experience having carried out these activities for a long time.

With her new loan she is going to buy sheep and goats which she will raise and sell later on. The profits she makes from her activities will enable her to save money and help her husband out with the family expenses;

loans.use: to buy sheep and goats

loans.name: Yayamane Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 12 juin 2008. Il  est  constitué de 13 femmes qui habitent le même village. Leur activité principale est le commerce.

Angélique qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 37 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 06 enfants. Elle a aussi en sa charge 02 autres enfants confiés par ses parents.

Elle s’active dans l'élevage et la vente de porcs. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, qu’elle pratique depuis plusieurs années.

Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  son activité.

Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, habillement etc.…) et d’augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
The community group was created on the 12th June 2008. It comprises 13 women who live in the same village. Their main business is trading activity. Angélique, who is on the right of the photo with her hand raised, is the group leader. She is 37 years old. She is married and the mother of 6 children. She also has 2 other children in her care, who have been entrusted to her by her parents. 
She is a pig farmer. She has good experience in this activity, which she has been doing for several years. This loan will allow her to increase her working capital and to better develop her business. The profits will allow her to improve the family's living conditions (health, food, clothing etc) and to increase her savings.

loans.use: to purchase pigs for resale

loans.name: Diambar Jiguén Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Diambar Jiguén qui compte actuellement 9 membres a été crée depuis le cycle du banc villageois.

Il regroupe des femmes du même village, ayant de valeurs sociales communes et s'activant toutes dans le petit commerce. 

Madame Nogoye responsable de ce groupe est une femme mariée âgée de 47 ans et mère de 3 enfants et 3 autres qui lui sont confiés.

Nogoye (debout à l’extrême gauche de la photo) a comme activité principale le petit commerce de légumes.

Elle dispose d'une bonne expérience dans son domaine d'intervention pour l'avoir pratiqué depuis bientôt 20 ans.

Son nouveau crédit de 170.000 XOF  lui permettra de se procurer de la marchandises( pommes de terres 

,oignons,choux,tomates ...) qu'elle va revendre au niveau du petit marché de son village.

Les bénéfices générés par son activité lui permettront de soutenir son mari dans la gestion des dépenses 

quotidienne  de la famille.
texts.en: The Diambar Jiguén group, which currently has 9 members, was formed at the same time as the banc villegeois. It comprises women from the same village with common social values; all of them are small retail traders. Nogoye, the leader of this group, is a 47 year old married woman; she is the mother of 3 children and in addition cares for 3 others. Nogoye (standing on the far left of the photo) is principally a vegetable trader. She has a lot of experience, having done this for almost 20 years. Her new loan of 170,000 XOF will allow her to buy stock (potatoes, onions, cabbages, tomatoes...) which she will re-sell at the local market in her village. the profits earned from this will allow her to help her husband meet the daily living expenses of the family.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables

loans.name: Henry Lemuel

texts.es: El  Señor Henry, vive en  la ciudad de Choluteca, es muy conocido en la zona como emprendedor y muy trabajador, desde hace siete años que se dedica a la venta de sandalias para niños, jóvenes y adultos, su negocio comienza muy temprano cuando tiene que instalar una mesa para colocar su mercadería frente a un parque de la ciudad, esta en una zona muy estratégica ya que transitan miles de personas a diario, su producto es de buena calidad y buen precio que le permite satisfacer a sus clientes y con las ganancia cubrir sus necesidades. Esta casado y tiene dos niños por los cuales lucha cada día para poder sacarlos adelante, le gustaría poder ver crecer su negocio, espera que le podamos ayudar. Esta solicitando crédito por la cantidad de L. 15,000.00 para poder invertirlo en la compra de variedad de sandalias ya que esta temporada de verano es buena para su negocio.
texts.en:
Henry lives in the city of Choluteca.  He is very well known in the area as an entrepreneur and a very hard worker.  He has been selling sandals for children, young people and adults for seven years.  He starts work very early in the morning, setting up a table on which he displays his merchandise opposite a park in the city.  This is a very strategic area as thousands of people pass by every day.  Henry's products are good quality and he sells them at a good price.  This allows him to satisfy his customers and he uses his profits to cover his needs.

Henry is married and has two children.  He works hard every day in order to provide for them.  He would like to see his business grow and hopes that we can help him.  He is requesting a loan for 15,000 lempira to invest in buying a variety of different sandals because the summer season is a good one for his business.

loans.use: to buy sandals for his business

loans.name: Sope El Hadj Bara Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe sope El hadji Bara composé actuellement de 10 membres a été crée depuis le cycle un du BV.

Il regroupe des femmes issues d'un même village et partageant des liens sociaux communs .

Sa responsable Madame Daba debout à droite de la photo est une femme mariée âgée de 34 ans et mère de 3 

enfants à sa charge.

Elle s'active depuis presque 7 ans dans la confection de draps de lit qu'elle revend à ses camarades femmes de Banc Villageois 

Elle dispose d'une bonne expérience dans son domaine d'activité pour l'avoir menée depuis un certain temps.

Son nouveau crédit de 105000 XOF  lui permettra d'acheter de tissus pour en faire des draps.

Les bénéfices génèrés par son activité lui permettra de participer aux différentes charges familiales.
texts.en:
The Sope El Hadj Bara group is currently composed of 10 members and was created since the first cycle of the "banc villageois". It groups together women who come from the same village and share common social bonds.

The group's leader is Daba, standing on the right of the photo. She is 34 years old, married and the mother of 3 dependent children. She has been making bedsheets, which she resells to her fellow women of the "banc villageois", for nearly 7 years. She has a good experience in this line of work as she has been doing it for quite a while. Her new loan of 105 000 francs will allow her to buy fabric with which to make sheets. The profits generated by her business will allow to her contribute to the family's various expenses.

loans.use: to buy fabric with which to make sheets.

loans.name: Darou Salam Taku Liguey Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Darou Salam Taku liguey composé actuellement de 11 femmes a été crée depuis le premier cycle du BV.

Il regroupe des femmes issues du même village et partageant des valeurs sociales communes.

Madame Ndéye Coumba debout à l’extrême gauche de la photo est la responsable de ce groupe .

Madame Ndèye Coumba est une femme mariée âgée de 54 ans et mère de 3 enfants et 3 autres qui lui sont confiés.

Elle s'active dans le petit commerce par la vente de légumes et de condiments. Elle a une bonne expérience 

dans son domaine d'activité pour l'avoir exercée depuis presque 30 ans.

Son nouveau crédit de 190000 XOF lui permettra de se procurer de la marchandise ( oignons choux pommes 

de terres tomates poivres piments...) qu'elle va revendre au détails au niveau du petit marché de son village.

Les bénéfices de son activité lui permettront de participer aux besoins alimentaires de sa famille.
texts.en:
The Darou Salam Taku Liguey group is currently made up of 11 women, and was created during the first cycle of the "banc villageois". It groups together women from the same village who share common social values.

Ndéye Coumba, standing on the far left of the photo, is the group's leader. She is 54 years old, married and the mother of 3 children. She is also responsible for 3 more. She is a small retailer and sells vegetables and condiments. She has good experience in her area of work which she has been in for nearly 30 years. She will use her part of the loan (190 000 francs) to buy some merchandise (onions, cabbage, potatoes, tomatoes, peppers, etc) which she will resell to retail customers at her small village market. The profits from her business will allow her to contribute to her family's food needs.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and condiments.

loans.name: Sobeya Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 12 juin 2008. Il  est  constitué de 15 femmes qui habitent le même village. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.

Madame Mariama qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 62 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 04 enfants. 

Elle s’active dans la vente de poissons fumés. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, qu’elle pratique depuis plusieurs années.

Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités.

Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, habillement etc.…) et d’augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was created on June 12, 2008.  It consists of 15 women who live in the same village.  Their main activity is small retail business.

Mariama is the representative of the group.  She is standing at the far right in the photo and raising her hand.  She is 62 years old, married, and the mother of 4 children.

She is actively involved in the sale of smoked fish.  She has been practicing this activity for several years and has a good experience in this field. 

This loan will allow her to strengthen her capital and to better develop her activity.

The profits generated from her business will allow her to increase her savings and to provide better living conditions for her family (health, food, clothes etc...)

loans.use: to buy smoked fish for resale.

loans.name: Taku Liguey Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Taku liguey  composé de 11 membres a été crée depuis le premier cycle du BV .

Il regroupe des femmes du même village ayant de valeurs sociales communes et s'activant toutes dans le petit 

commerce .

Sa responsable madame Fatime est une femme mariée âgée de 61 ans, elle n'a pas d'enfants mais on lui a confié 3 qui sont à sa charge.

Fatime,  debout à l’extrême gauche de la photo fait du petit commerce par la vente de couscous, une activité 

qu'elle pratique depuis bientôt une dizaine d'années, c'est pourquoi elle dispose d'une bonne expérience dans ce domaine.

Son nouveau crédit de 90000 XOF lui permettra de payer 8 sacs de mil pour en faire du couscous qu'elle 

va revendre dans son village.

Les bénéfices de son activité lui permettront de payer la nourriture pour les enfants qui lui sont confiés, 

mais également de faire des épargnes au niveau du Banc Villageois.
texts.en: The Taku liguey group of 11 members was created at the same time as the BV (Banc Villageois). It comprises women from the same village who share common social values, all of whom are small retail traders. The group leader Fatime is a 61 year old married women, she has no children of her own but cares for 3 who have been entrusted to her. Fatime, standing on the far left in the photograph, is a small retailer selling couscous, a business she has conducted for almost ten years - this is why she has a lot of experience in this activity. Her new loan of 90,000 XOF will allow her to buy 8 sacks of millet, to make couscous with, which she will sell in her village. The profits from her business will allow her to buy food for the children in her care, but also to have some savings with the the Banc Villageois.

loans.use: to purchase millet for preparing couscous to sell

loans.name: Duo Cristo Rey Group

texts.es: Duo Cristo Rey. Ingrid de 22 años ella se dedica a la elavoracion de tejidos tipicos desde hace 8 años nos cuenta que esta luchando para salir adelante dia a dia en con su negosio ya que por medio del negocio se a ayudado mucho,ella tege los tejidos tipicos que son del municipio ademas tege fajas que las señoras usan ára poder amarrarse el corte que usan, ella tege diariamente las blusas y fajas nos cuenta que a sabido organizar muy bien su tiempo porque por las mañanas teje blusas y por las tardes teje fajas ella entrega su producto en diferentes tiendas del municipio y le a ido muy bien,esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la comfeccion de tejidos,tipicos. la siguiente socia se dedica a la venta de ropa Américana,
texts.en:
Duo Cristo Rey.  

Ingrid, age 22, has made a living making traditional fabrics for eight years.  She tells us that she is fighting to get ahead day to day with her business, because through her business she has helped herself greatly.  

She weaves the traditional fabrics of her town in addition to weaving the belts that women wear to tie the traditional skirts they wear.  She weaves the blouses and belts daily, and tells us that she knows how to organize her time well because in the morning she weaves the blouses and in the afternoons she weaves the belts.  She delivers her products to different shops in the town and she has done very well.  

She is asking for this loan in order to buy the raw materials for making traditional fabrics.  The other member of this group make a living selling American clothing.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for making traditional fabrics.

loans.name: Duo Flor Chimalteca Group

texts.es: Duo Flor Chimalteca, Doña Magdalena de 42 años de edad ella se dedica a la venta de ropa tipica desde hace 2 años nos cuenta que esta solicitando este credito para la compra de ropa tipica ya que esta conciente de que le falta capital para trabajar porque sus clientes han umentado considerablemente el sueño de ella es tener un local donde ofrecer sus producto, al igual que el siguiente socio se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos.
texts.en: Of the group Duo Flor Chimalteca - Flower of Chimaltenango Duo - Magdalena is 42 years old and she has been making a living selling traditional clothing for the last 2 years. She shares she is requesting this loan to buy more traditional clothing since she is aware that she is lacking the capital to work with because her customers have increased considerably. Her dream is to have a business premise where she can offer her products, the same as  the group member next to her, he makes a living breeding and selling chickens.

loans.use: to buy traditional clothing to sell.

loans.name: Sop Serigne Fallou Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité Sop Serigne Fallou existe depuis le 14 décembre 2008, il est composé de six femmes qui sont des voisines, elles se réunissent régulièrement afin de s'enquérir de leurs différents problèmes L'activité principale est le commerce.


Madame Diakhou la responsable est âgée de 45 ans, mariée elle est mère de sept enfants et s'active dans la restauration,elle capitalise une bonne expérience de douze ans. Sur la photo elle est debout à droite habillée en robe rouge avec un châle jaune autour des épaules et a levé la main gauche. 


Elle tient son restaurant tout près d'une boulangerie sur la route de l’hôpital régional.

Son prêt lui servira à développer son activité.


Elle souhaite avec ses bénéfices réaliser une épargne beaucoup plus consistante afin de pouvoir acheter une maison pour ses enfants.
texts.en:
The Sop Serigne Fallou solidarity group was founded on December 14, 2008. It is made up of six women who are neighbors. They meet regularly to ask after one another's various problems. Their main activity is commerce.

The leader, Diakhou, is 45 years old, married, and mother of seven children. She runs a restaurant, and has 12 years of experience. In the photo, she is standing on the right-hand side, with her left hand raised, wearing a red dress and a yellow shawl around her shoulders.

Her restaurant is located near a bakery, along the road leading to the regional hospital.

Her loan will help her to develop her business.

With her profits, she hopes to significantly increase her savings in order to be able to buy a house for her children.

loans.use: to buy condiments for their restaurant

loans.name: Karambenor Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 22 Mars 2001. Il  est  constitué de 15 femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.

Madame Mariama qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 51 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 08 enfants. Elle a aussi en sa charge 07 autres enfants confiés par ses parents.

Elle s’active dans la vente de bois de chauffe et d'huile de palme. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, qu’elle pratique depuis plusieurs années.

Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités.

Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, habillement etc.…) et d’augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
The solidarity group was created on March 22, 2001. It is made up of 15 women who live in the same neighborhood. Their main activity is small-scale retail.

Mariama, who is on the right-hand side of the photo with her hand raised, is the group leader. She is 51 years old. She is married and mother of eight children. She also has seven other children entrusted to her care by their parents.

She sells firewood and palm oil. She has plenty of experience in this field, which she has been involved in for several years.

This loan will allow her to increase her capital and better develop her business.

The profits will allow her to improve the living conditions of her family (health, food, clothing, etc.) and increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy firewood and palm oil intended for resale

loans.name: Solidario El Rosario Group

texts.es: Solidario el Rosario. Alicia, de 51 años de edad ella tiene una tienda de productos comestibles de consumo diario y tambien vende almuersos desde hace 12 años, nos cuenta que nececita mas capital para trabajar ya que sus clientes tanto en la tienda como en las refacciones le esta pidiendo cada dia mas variedades en refacciones y productos comestibles,es por eso que esta solicitando este credito para la compra de mas mercaderias en productos comestibles y mercaderia para elavorar mas refacciones, esta muy contenta y agradecida con Dios por aberle dado la oportunidad de obtener este negocio ya que es una forma de ayudar a su familia,por lo tanto las otras dos integrantes nececitan el credito para la compra de mercaderia para la venta.
texts.en:
Solidario el Rosario 

Alicia is 51 years old and she has had a store that sells food products for everyday use where she has also sold lunches for 12 years. She tells us that she needs more capital to keep working since her customers, both those who buy groceries and those who buy lunches, ask every day for more variety in both meals and food products. 

This is why she asks for this loan, which she will use to buy more food products and products to make more meals. She is very happy and thanks God for having given her the opportunity to own this shop, as it is a way to help her family. 

The other two members of the group need this loan to buy products for resale as well.

loans.use: to buy everyday food products and ingredients to make lunches.

location.town: Aldea Vista Hermosa, San Pedro Sacatepequez

loans.name: Sope Serign Fallou Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Sope serign Falou a été crée depuis le premier cycle du banc villageois il est composé actuellement de 10 membres .

Il regroupe des femmes habitant le même village partageant des valeurs sociales communes et s'activant toutes presque dans le petit commerce de légumes.

La responsable madame Astou (asise à l’extrême gauche de la photo avec un écharpe blanc sur la tête) Elle est une femme  marié et mère de 3 enfants et 2 autres qui lui sont confiés. Elle est âgée de 46 ans 

Elle s'active dans le petit commerce par la vente de légumes et fruits.

Elle dispose d'une expérience pour avoir mener cette activité depuis presque 7 ans .

Son nouveau crédit de 50.000 XOF lui permettra de se procurer de la marchandise( tomates 

,carrotes,choux,aubergines oranges mangues...)

Les bénéfices réalisés lui permettront d’épargner au niveau du banc villageois et renforcer son activité.
texts.en:
The Sope serign Falou group was created at the time of its first cycle with the "banc villageois." It currently has ten members.

It brings together women who live in the same village, share common social values, and almost all of whom are involved in the small-scale retail of vegetables.

Astou is the group leader (seated on the far left of the photo, with a white scarf on her head). She is married and mother of three children, as well as two others who have been entrusted to her care. She is 46 years old.

She works as a small-scale vendor of fruits and vegetables.

She has almost seven years of experience in this line of work.

Her new 50,000 XOF loan will allow her to stock up on goods for her business (tomatoes, carrots, cabbage, eggplants, oranges, mangos...)

The profits will allow her to have savings at the "banc villageois" and strengthen her business.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Deggo Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 23 Mars 2001. Il  est  constitué de 15 femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.
Madame Maïmouna qui est à gauche de la photo levant la main est responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 48 ans. Elle est veuve et elle n'a pas d'enfants. Mais elle a en sa charge 02 enfants confié par des parents.
Elle s’active dans la vente de légumes. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, qu’elle pratique depuis plusieurs années.
Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités.
Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, habillement etc.…) et d’augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was created on the 23rd of March, 2001. It is made up of 15 women who live in the same district. Their main type of business activity is small retail.

Maïmouna, on the left of the photo, raising her hand, is the group's leader. She is 48 years old, widowed and has no children. She is, however, responsible for 2 children entrusted to her by relatives. She sells vegetables and has a good experience in this line of work, which she has been practicing for several years. This loan will enable her to strengthen her capital and better develop her business activities. The profits will allow her to improve her family's living conditions (health, food, clothing, etc.) and to build up her savings.

loans.use: to buy vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase typical clothing

loans.name: And Liguey Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité And liguey a été crée depuis le cycle un du banc villageois . Il est composé actuellement de 8 femmes qui habitent toutes le même village et se partagent de valeurs sociales communes. Leur activité principale se trouve être le petit commerce.

Sa responsable madame Déguéne (assise à l’extrême gauche de la photo avec une écharpe blanche sur la tête) est une femme mariée âgée de 65 ans et mère de 3 enfants et 2 autres qui lui sont confiés .

Elle développe une activité de petit commerce par la vente de denrées alimentaires.

Elle pratique cette activité depuis une bonne durée c'est pourquoi elle en dispose une bonne expérience.

Son nouveau prêt de 80.000 XOF lui permettra de s'approvisionner en huile riz poissons séchés et fumés 

qu'elle va revendre lors des marchés hebdomadaire des villages environnants.

Les bénéfices que génèrent sont activité lui permettent de payer les frais de scolarité de ses enfants .
texts.en:
The And Liguey solidarity group was created during the first cycle of the "banc villageois". It is presently composed of 8 women who all live in the same village and share common social values. Their main business activity is small retail.
